Question: day by
Answer: "day by" kay tlash kay ntaij main is asatalaha kay mtadd mkhtlf many aur astamal shaml hayn: dawichay bahan: yeh jrmn nyshnl rylway kmpny hay ، jo jrmny aur ywrp kay liye tryn kay tkt aur sfry malwmat pysh krty haay۔ daysybl: daysybl (day by) ayk ywnt haay۔dw jsmany mkdar ، aam tawr par sawty ya bjly ki taakt ki mkdar ، ya aawazawn kay nsbta blnd hony ki pymaish kay liye tnasb ko zaahar karnay kay liye astamal hony wali pymaish ky۔yha tnasb ko byan karnay ka ayk mntaky tarykha hay ، aur yeh alyktranks ، sghnlza ، aur mwasalat 234.DB shmaly amrykha main wsya pymanay par astamal hawta haay: yeh ayk askyndaynywynya main mkym trywl ghyir kmpny hay jo aap ko kesi bhi chyza kay l ready tyar rhanay main mdd kay liye hawshyar trywl ghyir mhaya krty haay۔rwdaan ki msanwaat ko aap ki zandghy kay tamam sfrwn par mwafkt pzayr sathy bnnay kay liye dayzaain kya gaya haay۔ dusra astamal: "day by" marwl kamks ، ayk fransysy aatwmwbail bnanay wali kmpny ، lynks ki tksym ، aur mazeed 6.in smry main nyw yark sty kay ayk khyaly akhbar ka hawalha bhi dy sakta haay۔ "day by "syak wa sbak par mnhasar kiy mkhtlf chyzawn ka hawalha dy sakta hay ، bshmwl ayk rylway kmpny ، aawaza ki pymaish ka ayk ywnt ، trywl ghyir kmpny ، aur mazeed kchh۔

Question: ayk tybl aur dayta bys main kya frk haay؟
Answer: ayk dayta bys aur ayk tybl dono ko zakhyrha karnay sy mtalk hain ، lekin un main kuch aham akhtlafat hayn۔yhaan ayk dayta bys aur ayk tybl kay mabyn aham akhtlafat hayn: dayta bys: mnzam aur sakhty aadad wa shmar ka ayk mjmwaha js tak kmpywtrza tak rsaiy haasal ki jaskty haay۔ mtadd jdwlwn ، aaraa ، zakhyrha shuda tarykha kar aur afaal par mushtamil haay۔ myzawn kay ayk mjmwaha kay liye nam ki jghha kay tawr par kam krta haay۔chabyan kay zaryaay ayk dusray sy mtalk tyblwn par mushtamil hawskta haay۔ tybl: ayk do jhaty dahanchha js main mtadd kalm aur ktaaryn shaml hayn۔ dayta bys kay andr mwjwd dayta ko astwr krta haay۔ ayk hi mtalkha anwan par dayta ka ayk mjmwaha haay۔ yeh dayta bys kay andr ayk shay haay۔khlasaha yeh keh ، ayk tybl ayk dayta bys kay andr ayk dahanchha hay jo dayta ko astwr krta hay ، jabky ayk dayta bys mnzam aur sakhty aadad wa shmar ka ayk mjmwaha hay js main mtadd jdwlyn ، aaraa ، zakhyrha shuda tarykha kar ، aur afaal shaml hawsktay hayn۔

Question: dayta ki mkhtlf aksam kya hain jo ays kyw ayl dayta bys main mhafwza ki jaskty hayn؟
Answer: ays kyw ayl dayta ki mkhtlf aksam ki hamayt krta hay jo mkhtlf ksm kay dayta ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔yhaan dayta ki aham aksam hain jo ays kyw ayl dayta bys main mhafwza ki jaskty hayn: addy aadad wa shmar ki aksam: un main addy ، aasharyha ، flwt ، dabl aur bwlyn dayta ki aksam shaml hayn۔wha addy akdar ، jesay pori tadad ، aasharyha ، aur sahayha/ghlta akdar ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal hawtay hayn۔ tarykh aur wkt kay aadad wa shmar ki aksam: un main tarykh ، wkt ، dayt taim aur taim astymp dayta ki aksam shaml hayn۔an ka astamal tarykh aur wkt ki akdar ، jesay tarykhwn ، awkat aur taim astymp ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye kya jata haay۔ aadad wa shmar ki aksam: un main char ، wrchr ، mtn aur blab dayta ki aksam shaml hayn۔an ka astamal krdar aur mtn kay aadad wa shmar ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye kya jata hay ، jesay nam ، ptay ، aur wzuahat۔ aspyshl dayta aksam: un main pwaint ، lain ، ksayralazulaa aur jywmytry dayta ki aksam shaml hayn۔an ka astamal mkamy dayta ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye kya jata hay ، jesay kwaardaynyt aur shklyn۔ JSON dayta ki aksam: un main JSON aur JSONB dayta ki ksmyn shaml hayn۔an ka astamal JSON (jawa askrpt aabjykt asharay) kay aadad wa shmar ko astwr karnay kay liye kya jata hay ، jo ayk halka phlka dayta antrchynj farmyt haay۔ smry main ، ays kyw ayl mkhtlf ksm kay dayta ki ksmwn ki hamayt krta hay ، js main mkhtlf ksm kay dayta ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay ، js main addy ، tarykh aur wkt ، tar ، strngh shaml haay۔، mkamy ، aur JSON dayta ki ksmyn

Question: ayk bnyady klyd kya haay؟
Answer: ayk bnyady klyd ayk rshtha dar dayta bys tybl main kalmwn ka ayk khasa kalm ya mjmwaha hay jo tybl main hr rykarda ko mnfrd tawr par shnakht krta haay۔yha tybl kay andr dayta ko jldy sy tjzayha karnay kay liye ayk anwkha shnakht knndha kay tawr par astamal kya jata hay aur yeh ayk mwsar rshtha dar dayta bys kay liye aham haay۔ayk bnyady klyd main aadad wa shmar ki hr ktaar kay l a ayk anwkhy kdr honi chahaiay ، is main kaladm akdar shaml nahin hawsktay hain ، aur hr saf main bnyady klydy kdr honi chahaiay۔bnyady klyd ayk ya zayada kalmwn par mushtamil hawskty hay ، aur yeh bnyady dayta madal main pehlay sy mwjwd ayk ya zayada fyldaza ka astamal krskta hay ، ya bnyady klyd bnnay kay liye ayk mkhsawsa azuafy fylda tshkyl diya jaskta haay۔bnyady klyd aham hay kywnkha is sy aadad wa shmar ki mstkl mzaajy aur salmyt ko ykyny bnanay main mdd mlty hay ، aur yeh aap ko malwmat kay sirf tyn tkrawn ka astamal krkay dayta bys main dakhl krdha dayta kay hr ayk tkraay ko bazayaft karnay ki ajazat dyta haay: tybl ka nam ، is ka namkalm ، aur ROW123456.1Techopedia2techtarget3secoda4wikedia5ibm6relationaldbdesign ki bnyady klyd

Question: ghair mlky klyd kya haay؟
Answer: ghair mlky klyd ayk tybl main kalm ya kalm ka syt hay jo kesi aur tybl ki bnyady klyd ka hawalha dyta haay۔yha do jdwlwn kay mabyn ayk lnk kaim krta hay aur do jdwlwn kay mabyn ryfrnl salmyt ko nafza karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔ayk tybl main ghair mlky klydy kalm dusray tybl main bnyady klydy kalm sy mnslk haay۔as bat ko ykyny bnata hay keh hawalha denay waly tybl kay ghair mlky klydy kalm main mwjwd dayta hawalha shuda tybl kay bnyady klydy kalm main dayta sy mmasal haay۔ghyr mlky klydy rkawt un akdamat ko rwkty hay jo myzawn kay mabyn rwabta ko khtm krdyn gi aur yeh ykyny bnaty hain keh ghair mlky klydy kalm main mwjwd dayta drst haay۔SQL123456.1Wikedia2W3Schools3microsoft4techtarget5mysql6tutorialsPoint main ghair mlky klyd ko ghair mlky klydy rkawt ka astamal karty hoey tshkyl diya jaskta hay

Question: andayks kya haay؟
Answer: andayks ayk dayta dahanchha hay jo kesi tybl main aapryshn ki rftar ko bhatr bnanay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔yha ayk anwkha dayta dahanchha hay jo aadad wa shmar ka sirf ayk trtyb shuda sab syt tybl ktaar sy alag krta haay۔asharyha jat dayta bys anjn ko mkhsawsa kalm akdar kay sath ktaaryn tlash karnay ki ajazat dytay hain ، baghair kesi swal kay liye tybl main mwjwd tamam ktaarwn ko askyn kyay۔wha dayta ko tyzay sy bazayaft karnay ، dayta ki tlash ko tyza karnay aur dayta bys ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay main mdd karty hayn۔asharyha ayk ya zayada kalmwn ka astamal karty hoey bnaiay jasktay hain ، jo tyzay sy bay trtyb tlash aur rykardawn tak rsaiy kay mwsar aardar dono ki bnyad fraham karty hayn۔an ko un swalat ko tyza karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay jn ko tlash ki zurwrt hawty hay aur kdr ki anfradyt ko nafza karnay kay liay۔ays kyw ayl mkhtlf ksm kay asharyha jat ki hamayt krta hay ، bshmwl mnfrd asharyha ، pryfks andayks ، aur pwshydha asharyha jat 123456.1 dayjytlwsyn 2 aym waiy ays kyw ayl tywtwryl 3 javatpoint4section5tutorialstuturials6mysql

Question: ayk nzaarha kya haay؟
Answer: ayk nzaarha ayk wrchwil tybl hay jo dayta bys main zakhyrha shuda astfsar kay zaryaha tkhlyk kya gaya haay۔yha ayk mntaky jdwl hay jo jsmany tawr par mwjwd nahin hay lekin ayk mntkhb byan kay zaryaha tkhlyk kya gaya hay jo dayta bys main ayk ya zayada jdwlwn sy dayta bazayaft krta haay۔khyalat ko pychydha swalat ko aasan bnanay ، tybl sy dayta ka sab syt fraham karnay ya kuch aadad wa shmar tak rsaiy ko mhadwd karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔wha dayta lght main pehlay sy kaim kwiry kmanda kay tawr par dayta bys main mhafwza hayn۔nzaryat ko isi tarah sy astfsar kya jaskta hay jesay mstkl dayta bys jma karnay waly aabjykt ki tarah ، aur mtalkha bnyady jdwl main dayta par laghw hony wali tbdylyan nzaryha kay bad ki drkhwastwn main dkhaiay gaye aadad wa shmar main zaahar hawty hayn۔nzaryat myzawn par fwaid fraham krsktay hain ، jesay byrwny dnya main bnyady jdwlwn ki nmaish ki daghry ko mhadwd karna ، zakhyrha karnay kay liye bohat kam jghha lena ، aur ktaarwn kay pehlay sy taay shuda syt tak rsaiy ko mhadwd krkay tybl sykywrty ki ayk azuafy staha fraham krna۔ayk tybl 123456.1wikeipedia2navicat3odlestechnologise4ibm5essionalsientsientsientsionalsionsientsal6geeksforgeeks

Question: zakhyrha shuda tarykha kar kya haay؟
Answer: zakhyrha shuda tarykha kar ays kyw ayl kay byanat ka ayk mjmwaha hay jo kesi dayta bys main kesi shay kay tawr par mhafwza kya jata hay aur isy dayta bys par aml main laya jaskta haay۔yha pehlay sy mrtb shuda ays kyw ayl byanat ka ayk ghrwp hay jsay bar bar dwbarha astamal kya jaskta haay۔zakhyrha shuda tarykha kar prwghramngh main afaal sy mlta jlta hay aur jab fwn kya jata hay tou woh mkhsawsa aapryshn anjam dy saktay hayn۔an ka astamal dayta bys ki wsya rynj ko anjam denay kay liye kya jata hay jesay dayta ko dakhl karna ، ap dayt karna ، ya hazaf karna ، rpwrtyn tyar karna ، aur pychydha hasab ktab krna۔zakhyrha shuda tarykha kar bohat mfyd hain kywnkha woh aap ko ayk ywnt kay tawr par ays kyw ayl kay byanat kay ayk syt ko smytnay aur mkhtlf pyramytrza kay sath bar bar un par aml draamd karnay ki ajazat dytay hain ، js sy kwda ka antzaam aur dwbarha astamal karna aasan hawjata haay۔ays kyw ayl main tkhlyk kay tarykha kar kay byan ka astamal karty hoey zakhyrha shuda tarykha kar tshkyl diya jaskta hay ، aur un ko mkhtlf un pt pyramytrza kay sath anjam dy kar un ka tjrbha kya jaskta haay۔zakhyrha shuda tarykha kar saarf antrfys aur dayta bys kay mabyn sykywrty ki ayk aham prt fraham krta hay ، aur woh dayta tak rsaiy kay kntrwl kay zaryaha sykywrty ki hamayt karty hain kywnkha akhttamy saarf dayta dakhl ya tbdyl krsktay hain ، lekin tarykha kar lkh nahin saktay hayn۔wha dayta ki salmyt ko bhi mhafwza rkhtay hain kywnkha malwmat ko mstkl andaza main dakhl kya jata hay aur pydawary salahayt ko bhatr bnaya jata hay kywnkha zakhyrha shuda tarykha kar main byanat sirf ayk bar lkhay jaiyn۔

Question: mhark kya haay؟
Answer: trghr ayk khasa ksm ka zakhyrha shuda tarykha kar ya zakhyrha shuda prwghram hawta hay jo kesi khasa wakaha ko dayta bys main pysh aanay par khud bkhwd aml main laya jata haay۔yha ayk dayta bys aabjykt hay jo kesi khasa wakaha ko anjam denay kay liye astamal kya jata hay jab koi khasa wakaha pysh aata hay ، jesay kesi tybl par dakhl ، ap dayt ، ya daylyt aapryshn۔mharkat ko karwbary kwaad ko nafza karnay ، dayta ki salmyt ko brkrar rkhnay aur pychydha dayta ki twsayk karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔anhayn ays kyw ayl main tkhlyk trghr byan ka astamal karty hoey tkhlyk kya jaskta hay ، aur un ko mhark wakaha sy pehlay ya is kay bad ya tou is par aml draamd karnay ki wzuahat ki jaskty haay۔trghrza ko wsya pymanay par afaal anjam denay kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay ، jesay aadad wa shmar main tbdylywn ka aadat karna ، ryfrnshl salmyt ko nafza karna ، aur smry tyblza ko ap dayt krna۔wha khud kar kamwn kay l useful mfyd hain jn kay liye bsawrt dyghr dsty mdakhlt ki zurwrt hogi ، aur woh is bat ko ykyny bnanay main mdd krsktay hain keh dayta mstkl aur drst haw۔

Question: lyn dyn kya haay؟
Answer: tranzaykshn dayta bys ki karrwaiywn ka ayk tslsl hay jo aadad wa shmar main mstkl mzaajy aur salmyt ko ykyny bnanay kay liye ayk hi hasty kay tawr par ayk sath ghrwp kya jata haay۔yha dayta bys mynjmnt sstm (day by aym ays) main anjam dyiay gaye kam ki sab sy chhwty mntaky akaiy hay aur is ki wzuahat mtalkha kamwn kay ayk syt kay tawr par ki jaskty hay jo ayk hi karrwaiy kay tawr par slwk kya jata haay۔lyn dyn ka astamal dayta bys ki wsya rynj ko anjam denay kay liye kya jata hay jesay aadad wa shmar ko dakhl karna ، ap dayt karna ، ya hazaf karna ، rpwrtyn tyar karna ، aur pychydha hasab ktab krna۔lyn dyn ko drst smjha janay kay liye tyzaab ki khsawsayat (jwhary ، mstkl mzaajy ، tnhaaiy aur asthakam) ko pora karna chahaiay۔tyzaab ki khsawsayat is bat ko ykyny bnaty hain keh lyn dyn ko kam ki ayk akaiy kay tawr par smjha jata hay ، keh tamam aapryshnza ko dayta bys main hony wali kesi bhi tbdyly kay l succeed kamyab hona chahaiay ، aur yeh keh kesi dayta bys main koi ryast nahin honi chahaiay jahan lyn dyn ko jzawy tawr par mkml kya jata haay۔lyn dyn aam tawr par dayta bys sy wabstha hawta hay aur dayta ki salmyt ko ykyny bnanay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔

Question: kesi slykt aur hazaf shuda byan main kya frk haay؟
Answer: yahan ayk slykt aur daylyt byan kay mabyn aham akhtlafat hayn: byan mntkhb kryn: dayta bys main ayk ya ayk sy zayada jdwlwn sy dayta bazayaft krta haay۔ tybl main mwjwd dayta main trmym nahin karty hayn۔ ayk aysa ntyjha syt dwbarha tyar krta hay jo dayta ko zaahar karnay ya jwra twra kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔fltr ، trtyb denay aur ghrwp dayta kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔ daylyt byan: dayta bys main tybl sy ayk ya zayada rykardaza ko hata dyta haay۔ ktaar ko hazaf krkay tybl main mwjwd dayta ko tyar krta haay۔ayk tybl main ktaaryn ya tamam ktaaryn۔ khlasaha ، ayk mntkhb byan dayta bys main ayk ya zayada jdwlwn sy dayta bazayaft krta hay ، jabky hazaf karnay wala byan dayta bys main tybl sy ayk ya zayada rykardaza ko hata dyta haay۔dwnwn kay darmiyan bnyady frk yeh hay keh mntkhb krdha dayta ko tybl main trmym nahin krta hay ، jabky hazaf karnay sy ktaaat ko hazaf krkay dayta main trmym ki jati haay۔

Question: dakhl aur ap dayt kay byan main kya frk haay؟
Answer: yahan ayk dakhl aur tazaha kary kay byan kay darmiyan aham akhtlafat hayn: dakhl karain byan: dayta bys main tybl main niay rykarda shaml krta haay۔ mwjwdha rykardawn main trmym nah kryn۔ ayk wkt main ayk ya zayada ktaaryn dakhl kryn۔tybl۔ ap dayt byan: kesi dayta bys main tybl main mwjwdha rykardawn main trmym krta haay۔ksy dayta bys main ayk tybl par ، jabky ayk tazaha kary ka byan ayk tybl main mwjwdha rykardawn main trmym krta haay۔dwnwn kay darmiyan bnyady frk yeh hay keh dakhl karnay sy ayk tybl main nya dayta shaml hawta hay ، jabky ap dayt ayk tybl main dayta ko tbdyl krta haay۔

Question: shmwlyt aur ywnyn kay byan main kya frk haay؟
Answer: yahan shaml hony aur ywnyn kay byan kay mabyn aham akhtlafat yeh hayn: shaml byan: un kay mabyn mmasal haalt ki bnyad par do ya zayada jdwlwn sy dayta ko ykja krta haay۔ dono jdwlwn kay kalmwn kay sath ayk niy tybl tyar krta haay۔ mtalkha jdwlwn sy dayta bazayaft karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔. tyblza kay darmiyan mmasal rykardawn ko bazayaft karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔dw ya zayada jdwlwn kay aadad wa shmar۔ khlasaha main ، ayk jwain astytmnt un kay mabyn mmasal haalt ki bnyad par do ya zayada jdwlwn kay aadad wa shmar ko ykja krta hay ، jabky ywnyn ka byan do ya zayada mntkhb byanat kay ntaij kay syt ko ykja krta haay۔dwnwn kay mabyn bnyady frk yeh hay keh jwain dono jdwlwn kay kalmwn kay sath ayk nya tybl tyar krta hay ، jabky ywnyn alag alag ktaar kay sath ayk nya tybl tyar krta haay۔

Question: kahan aur ayk shk main frk haay؟
Answer: yahan aur ayk shk kay darmiyan aham akhtlafat yeh hayn: jahan shk: ayk mkhsawsa haalt par mbny tybl sy fltrza rykardaza۔ yeh kesi tybl sy mkhsawsa ktaarwn (anfrady ktaarwn) sy dayta fltr karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔ mntkhb karain ، ap dayt kryn۔، aur byanat ko hazaf kryn۔ yeh ayk ktaar aapryshn kay tawr par laghw hawta haay۔ yeh kesi bhi ghrwha bndy sy pehlay astamal hony wala astamal hawta haay۔ shk ki shk: ayk mkhsawsa haalt ki bnyad par ghrwpwn sy fltrza rykardaza۔ yeh ayk tybl par tyar krdha ghrwpwn sy dayta ko fltr karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔ sirf is kay sath astamal kya jaskta haay۔byanat ka antkhab kryn۔ kalm aapryshn kay tawr par laghw hawta haay۔ is ghrwp kay bad astamal kya jata haay۔an dono kay darmiyan bnyady frk yeh hay keh jahan kesi tybl sy mkhsawsa ktaarwn (anfrady ktaarwn) sy dayta ko fltr karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، jabky tybl par tyar krdha ghrwpwn sy dayta ko fltr karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔mzayd braan ، jahan ayk ktaar aapryshn kay tawr par laghw hawta hay aur kesi bhi ghrwha bndy sy pehlay astamal hawta hay ، jabky kalm aapryshn kay tawr par laghw hawta hay aur is ghrwp kay bad shk kay zaryaha astamal hawta haay۔

Question: kesi ghrwp kay zaryaha aur ayk alag byan main kya frk haay؟
Answer: yahan ayk ghrwp kay zaryaha aur ayk alag byan kay mabyn aham akhtlafat hayn: ghrwp kay zaryaha ghrwp: ayk mkhsawsa kalm ya azahaar ki akdar par mbny ghrwps ktaaryn۔ yeh ayk tybl kay kalmwn main mwjwd ayk jesi ktaarwn ko aktha karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔ astamal kya jaskta haay۔mjmway afaal jesay rkm ، ghnty ، aay wy jy ، wghyrha۔ kesi jdwl sy ktaarwn ko bazayaft karnay kay bad dayta ko ghrwp karnay kay liye astamal hony waly kalm (zabanyn) par mbny dayta ko ghrwp bndy krkay dayta ka khlasaha karnay kay liye astamal kya jaiay۔ksy ntaij kay syt say۔ yeh kalm ya azahaar sy mnfrd akdar ko bazayaft karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔ mntkhb byanat kay sath astamal kya jaskta haay۔ kalm sy mnfrd akdar ki fharst ko bazayaft karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔ayk mkhsawsa kalm ya azahaar ki kdryn ، jabky ayk alag byan ntaij kay syt sy daplykyt ktaaryn hatata haay۔dwnwn kay darmiyan bnyady frk yeh hay keh ghrwp bazaria kesi tybl sy ktaarwn ko bazayaft karnay kay bad ghrwp dayta kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، jabky kalm ya azahaar sy mnfrd akdar ko bazayaft karnay kay liye alag alag astamal hawta haay۔azuafy tawr par ، ghrwp bazaria mjmway afaal jesay rkm ، ghnty ، awsta wghyrha kay sath astamal kya jata hay ، jabky alag alag kalm sy mnfrd akdar ki fharst ko bazayaft karnay kay liye alag astamal kya jata haay۔

Question: andrwny shmwlyt aur baien bazaw main shaml hony main kya frk haay؟
Answer: yahan ayk andrwny shmwlyt aur baien bazaw kay darmiyan aham akhtlafat hayn: andrwny shmwlyt: dono jdwlwn kay mabyn sirf mmasal ktaaryn lwtty hayn۔ ghair mlap ki ktaaryn۔ntyjha braha rast shaml haay۔ is main shaml hawn: baien tybl sy tamam rykarda aur dien tybl sy mmasal rykarda waps krta haay۔ baien tybl sy tamam ktaaryn lghata hay ، yahan tak keh agar dien tybl main koi mych nahin haay۔daiyn tybl sy baien tybl aur mmasal aadad wa shmar۔ yeh ayk pychydha shmwlyt hay js main ntaij fraham kyay jasktay hain js main nwl wylywza shaml hayn۔ khlasaha main ، andrwny shmwlyt sirf dono jdwlwn kay mabyn mmasal ktaaryn lwtaty hay ، jabky baien bazaw baien myza sy tamam rykarda waps krta hay awrdaiyn tybl sy mmasal rykarda۔an dono kay mabyn bnyady frk yeh hay keh andrwny shmwlyt ghair mlap ki ktaaryn khtm krty hay ، jabky baien jwain baien myza sy tamam ktaaryn rkhty hay ، chahaay dien tybl main koi mych nah haw۔mzayd braan ، andrwny shmwlyt ka astamal dono jdwlwn main mwjwd dayta ko bazayaft karnay kay liye kya jata hay ، jabky baien jwain ko baien tybl sy tamam dayta ko bazayaft karnay aur dien tybl sy mlap kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔

Question: ayk ghnty aur rkm kay byan main kya frk haay؟
Answer: yahan ayk ghnty aur rkm kay byan kay mabyn aham akhtlafat hayn: ghnty ka byan: ayk mkhsawsa kalm main adm khaly akdar ki tadad ka shmar krta haay۔ hr ktaar ko lazmi tawr par 1 kay tawr par shmar kya jata haay۔.kyn ko ghnnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay keh ktny ktaarwn main ayk mkhsawsa kalm kay liye ghair khaly kymt par mushtamil haay۔ aswm byan: mkhsawsa addy kalm main tamam akdar ki kal rkm ka hasab lghata haay۔ayk kalm main tamam akdar ki kal rkm۔ khlasaha ، ayk ghnty ka byan ayk mkhsawsa kalm main adm khaly akdar ki tadad ki ghnty krta hay ، jabky ayk rkm ka byan mkhsawsa addy kalm main tamam akdar ki kal rkm ka hasab lghata haay۔an dono kay darmiyan bnyady frk yeh hay keh ghnty zakhyrha shuda asal akdar ko mdnzar nahin rkhty hay ، jabky rkm zakhyrha shuda asal akdar ko mdnzar rkhty haay۔mzayd braan ، ghnty kay liye ghnty ka astamal kya jata hay keh ktny ktaaryn ayk mkhsawsa kalm kay liye ghair khaly kymt par mushtamil hawty hain ، jabky mjmway tawr par tamam akdar ki kal rkm ko kalm main haasal karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔

Question: zayada sy zayada aur ayk mnt kay byan main kya frk haay؟
Answer: yahan ayk zayada sy zayada aur ayk mnt kay byan kay darmiyan aham akhtlafat hayn: zayada sy zayada byan: kesi mkhsawsa kalm main zayada sy zayada kymt lwtata haay۔fraham krdha krdar kay azahaar sy kwlytngh tslsl main sab sy zayada kymt۔ aym aai ayn byan: ayk mkhsawsa kalm main kam sy kam kymt lwtata haay۔fraham krdha krdar kay azahaar sy kwlytngh tslsl main sab sy kam kymt۔ khlasaha main ، ayk zayada sy zayada byan ayk mkhsawsa kalm main zayada sy zayada kymt lwtata hay ، jabky ayk mnt ka byan ayk mkhsawsa kalm main kam sy kam kymt lwtata haay۔dwnwn kay darmiyan bnyady frk yeh hay keh myks ko kalm main aaly trien kymt tlash karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، jabky kam sy kam kalm main sab sy kam kymt tlash karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔azuafy tawr par ، dono byanat addy ، tarykh aur strngh dayta ki aksam kay sath astamal kyay jasktay hain ، aur dono kalm main kaladm akdar ko nzarandaza karty hayn۔

Question: kesi aardar kay zaryaha aur had kay byan main kya frk haay؟
Answer: ayk aardar kay zaryaha aur had kay byan kay mabyn aham akhtlafat yeh hayn: byan kay zaryaha aardar: ayk ya zayada kalmwn par mbny chrahaiy ya nzawl aardar main taay shuda ntyjha ko trtyb dyta haay۔ mntkhb byanat kay sath astamal kya jaskta haay۔nzawl aardar۔ yeh kesi tybl sy ktaarwn ko bazayaft karnay kay bad dayta ko trtyb denay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔.sry tybl sy waps aanay wali ktaarwn ki tadad ko mhadwd karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ khlasaha main ، byan kay zaryaha ayk aardar ayk ya zayada kalmwn ki bnyad par chrahtay ya nzawl aardar main taay shuda ntyjha ko trtyb dyta hay ، jabky ayk had byan kesi ntyjay main waps aanay wali ktaarwn ki tadad ko mhadwd krta haay۔sytdwnwn kay darmiyan bnyady frk yeh hay keh kesi tybl sy ktaarwn ko bazayaft karnay kay bad dayta ko trtyb denay kay liye aardar ka astamal kya jata hay ، jabky had ka astamal kesi tybl sy waps aanay wali ktaarwn ki tadad ko mhadwd karnay kay liye kya jata haay۔mzayd braan ، dono byanat ko mntkhb byanat kay sath astamal kya jaskta hay ، aur bazaria aardar dayta ko chrahaiy ya nzawl trtyb main trtyb denay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، jabky had ka astamal ktaarwn ki tadad ko mhadwd karnay kay liye kya jata haay۔

Question: bwlyn aur wrchr dayta ki ksm main kya frk haay؟
Answer: bwlyn aur wrchr dayta ki ksm kay darmiyan aham akhtlafat yeh hayn: bwlyn dayta ki ksm: do akdar kay astwryj ki hamayt krta haay: sch ya ghlta۔ kya sirf sahayha ya ghalat akdar ko kbwl kryn۔ yeh mntaky karrwaiywn kay liye astamal hawta haay۔ yeh tamam dayta bys main dstyab nahin haay۔، aur kuch dayta bys bwlyn akdar ko add aadad wa shmar ki aksam (tyny ant) main tbdyl karty hayn۔ wrchar dayta ki ksm: mtghyr ki lmbaiy kay krdarwn ko astwr krta haay۔ is kdr ko aaؤt pt krta hay ، baghair kesi azuafy jghhawn kay۔. khlasaha main ، ayk bwlyn dayta ki ksm do akdar kay astwryj ki hamayt krty haay: sahayha ya ghalat ، jabky ayk wrchr dayta taip mtghyr lmbaiy kay krdar ko astwr krta haay۔an dono kay mabyn bnyady frk yeh hay keh bwlyn sirf ya tou sahayha ya ghalat akdar ko kbwl krskta hay aur isy mntaky karrwaiywn kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، jabky wrchar ko tykst dayta ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔mzayd braan ، bwlyn tamam dayta bys main dstyab nahin hay ، aur kuch dayta bys bwlyn akdar ko antyjr dayta ki aksam (tyny ant) main tbdyl karty hain ، jabky wrchar zayada tr dayta bys main dstyab haay۔

Question: INT aur dayt taim dayta ki ksm main kya frk haay؟
Answer: yahan INT aur dayt taim dayta ki ksm kay darmiyan aham akhtlafat hayn: INT dayta ki ksm: astwrza antyjr wylywza۔ dawza ko zakhyrha nahin karty hayn۔akdar۔ 1 jnwry ، 1753 tak 31 dsmbr ، 9999 tak ki kymtwn ki kymtwn main tarykh aur wkt ki malwmat ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔dayta taip astwrza ki tarykh aur wkt ki akdar۔dwnwn kay mabyn bnyady frk yeh hay keh INT aasharyha akdar ko zakhyrha nahin krta hay aur pori tadad ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal hawta hay ، jabky dayt taim ykm jnwry 1753 sy 31 dsmbr ، 9999 tak ki akdar ko zakhyrha krskta hay ، aur tarykh aur wkt ki malwmat ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔azuafy tawr par ، INT ko ryazuy ki karrwaiywn kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay ، jabky dayt taim ko tarykh aur wkt kay hasab ktab kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔

Question: mtn aur blab dayta ki ksm main kya frk haay؟
Answer: yahan ayk mtn aur blab dayta ki ksm kay mabyn aham akhtlafat hayn: tykst dayta ki ksm: astwrza kryktr strngh dayta۔ zayada sy zayada saiza 65،535 baits۔ langh farm tykst dawr astwr karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔ksy bhi azuafy jghhawn ko tybl kalm main tykst dayta ki ksm kay sath aaghay brahanay ki zurwrt nahin hawty haay۔ akdar ko astwr karnay kay liye srwr ki mymwry ki bjaiay dask ki haysayt rkhta haay۔baints daat kam bainry mydaya dayta ، jesay aadayw ya wydayw lnks ، amyjza ، ya failwn ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ kalm tkhlyk karty wkt lmbaiy ki zurwrt nahin hawty haay۔ yeh addy akdar kay tawr par slwk kya jata hay jabky tykst aabjykt ko krdar kay dawr kay tawr par smjha jata haay۔dayta ko bazayaft karnay kay liye ayk azuafy bait ki zurwrt hawty haay۔ khlasaha ، ayk tykst dayta taip kryktr strngh dayta ko astwr krta hay ، jabky ayk blab dayta taip bainry strngh dayta ko astwr krta haay۔an dono kay darmiyan bnyady frk yeh hay keh mtn ko tawyl shkl kay mtn kay tarwn ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، jabky blab ka astamal bainry mydaya dayta ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye kya jata haay۔azuafy tawr par ، mtn ki kymt ko jesa keh baghair kesi azuafy jghhawn kay ، aur tybl kalm main tykst dayta ki ksm kay sath wazuha karnay ki zurwrt nahin hawty hay ، jabky blab ko addy akdar kay tawr par smjha jata hay jabky tykst aabjykt ko krdar kay tarwn kay tawr par smjha jata haay۔awr dayta ko bazayaft karnay kay liye ayk azuafy bait ki zurwrt hay

Question: flwt aur dabl dayta ki ksm main kya frk haay؟
Answer: yahan flwt aur dabl dayta ki ksm kay darmiyan aham akhtlafat hayn: flwt dayta ki ksm: snghl sahat sy mtalk flwtngh pwaint nmbr astwr krta haay۔ 6 sy 7 aasharyha handswn ki sahat sy mtalk۔akdar ki ayk aatdal psnd rynj۔ yeh dabl dayta ki ksm sy kam ayn mtaabk haay۔ dabl dayta ki ksm: astwrza dabl sahat sy mtalk flwtngh pwaint nmbr۔ 15 sy 16 aasharyha handswn ki sahat sy mtalk۔akdar ki ayk bray rynj kay sath۔ yeh flwt dayta ki ksm sy zayada ayn mtaabk haay۔ khlasaha yeh hay keh ، ayk flwt dayta taip snghl sahat sy mtalk flwtngh pwaint nmbr astwr krta hay ، jabky ayk dabl dayta taip astwr krta hay dabl sahat sy mtalk flwtngh pwaint nmbr۔dwnwn kay darmiyan bnyady frk yeh hay keh flwt main 6 sy 7 aasharyha handsay ki sahat sy mtalk hay aur is main 4 baits astwryj ki zurwrt hawty hay ، jabky dabl main 15 sy 16 aasharyha handsay ki sahat sy mtalk hawty hay aur is main 8 baits astwryj ki zurwrt hawty haay۔mzayd braan ، flwt ka astamal aasharyha tadad ko akdar ki ayk aatdal psnd rynj kay sath zakhyrha karnay kay liye kya jata hay ، jabky dabl ka astamal aasharyha nmbrwn ko bray had kay sath zakhyrha karnay kay liye kya jata haay۔aakhr main ، dabl flwt dayta ki ksm sy zayada ayn mtaabk haay۔

Question: aasharyha aur addy aadad wa shmar ki ksm main kya frk haay؟
Answer: yahan ayk aasharyha aur addy aadad wa shmar ki ksm kay darmiyan aham akhtlafat hayn: aasharyha aadad wa shmar ki ksm: ayn mtaabk aasharyha akdar ko astwr krta haay۔ saarf ki wzuahat shuda sahat sy mtalk aur pymanay pr۔ astwryj ki jghha ki ayk mkrrha mkdar ki tsadyk ki jati haay۔zayadha tr dayta bys main dstyab akdar۔zayadha tr dayta bys myn۔ smry main ، ayk aasharyha dayta ki ksm aur ayk addy aadad wa shmar ki ksm bnyady tawr par ayk jesay aur ayk dusray kay sath astamal hawty hayn۔dwnwn ayn mtaabk aasharyha akdar ، saarf ki wzuahat shuda sahat sy mtalk aur pymanay par ، zakhyrha karnay ki jghha ki ayk mkrrha mkdar ki zurwrt hawty hay ، aur akdar ki ayk aatdal psnd had kay sath aasharyha ki tadad ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔mzayd braan ، dono zayada tr dayta bys main dstyab hayn۔

Question: char aur wrchr dayta ki ksm main kya frk haay؟
Answer: yahan ayk char aur wrchar dayta ki ksm kay darmiyan aham akhtlafat hayn: char dayta ki ksm: astwrza fksda lmbaiy kay krdar kay tar waly aadad wa shmar ki ksmyn۔ astwryj ki jghha ki ayk mkrrha mkdar ki tsadyk ki jati haay۔ yeh wrchr dayta ki ksm sy kam lchkdar haay۔as sy ktaa nzar keh strngh ki lmbaiy sy ktaa nzar ، ayk mkrrha lmbaiy kay sath akdar ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، jesay pwstl kwdaza ya prwdakt kwdaza۔ wrchr dayta ki ksm: mtghyr lmbaiy kay krdar kay aadad wa shmar ki ksmwn ko astwr krta haay۔ astwryj ki jghha ki ayk mtghyr mkdar۔char dayta ki ksm sy zayadha۔ sirf astwryj ki jghha ki zurwry mkdar ، jo astwryj kay wsail ko bchaskty haay۔ yeh mtghyr ki lmbaiy kay sath akdar ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal hawta hay ، jesay nam ya tfsaylat۔ khlasaha ، ayk char dayta taip astwrza fksda lmbaiy kay krdar ki tardayta ki aksam ، jabky ayk wrchr dayta taip mtghyr lmbaiy kay krdar kay aadad wa shmar ki aksam ko astwr krta haay۔dwnwn kay mabyn bnyady frk yeh hay keh char ko astwryj ki jghha ki ayk mkrrha mkdar ki zurwrt hawty hay aur yeh wrchar dayta ki ksm sy kam lchkdar hawta hay ، jabky wrchr ko astwryj ki jghha ki mtghyr mkdar ki zurwrt hawty hay aur yeh char dayta taip sy zayada lchkdar hawta haay۔mzayd braan ، char tar ki lmbaiy sy ktaa nzar ، jghha ki ayk mkrrha rkm ka astamal krta hay ، jabky wrchr astwryj ki jghha ki sirf zurwry mkdar astamal krta hay ، jo astwryj kay wsail ko bchaskta haay۔aakhr main ، char ko ayk mkrrha lmbaiy kay sath akdar ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، jesay pwstl kwdaza ya prwdakt kwdaza ، jabky wrchar ko mtghyr lmbaiy kay sath akdar ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، jesay nam ya wzuahat۔

Question: bnyady klyd aur ayk anwkhy klyd main kya frk haay؟
Answer: yahan praimry klyd aur ayk anwkhy klyd kay darmiyan aham akhtlafat hayn: bnyady klyd: ayk bnyady klyd ayk kalm ya kalmwn ka ayk syt hay jo hr ktaar ko tybl main alag alag shnakht krta haay۔ ayk bnyady klyd main kaladm akdar shaml nahin hawsktay hayn۔ ayk tybl main sirf hawskta haay۔ayk bnyady klyd۔ ayk bnyady klyd dayta ki salmyt ko nafza karnay aur jdwlwn kay mabyn talkat kaim karnay kay liye astamal ki jati haay۔ ayk praimry klyd khud bkhwd asharyha sazay ki jati hay aur poray dayta bys main ayk ryfrns klyd kay tawr par astamal hawty haay۔kalm jo hr ktaar ko tybl main mnfrd tawr par shnakht karty hayn۔ ayk mnfrd klyd main kaladm akdar par mushtamil hawskta hay ، lekin fy kalm main sirf ayk hi naly kdr haay۔ aay tybl main mtadd anwkhy chabyan hawskty hayn۔ aadad wa shmar ki salmyt ko nafza karnay aur jdwlwn kay mabyn talkat kaim karnay kay liye ayk anwkhy klyd astamal ki jati haay۔ayk anwkhy klyd khud bkhwd trtyb di jati hay aur poray dayta bys main ayk hawalha klyd kay tawr par astamal hawty haay۔ khlasaha main ، ayk bnyady klyd aur ayk anwkhy klyd dono ko dayta ki salmyt ko nafza karnay aur jdwlwn kay mabyn talkat kaim karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔dwnwn kay darmiyan bnyady frk yeh hay keh ayk bnyady klyd main kaladm akdar par mushtamil nahin hawskta hay ، jabky ayk anwkhy klyd main kaladm akdar par mushtamil hawskta hay ، lekin fy kalm main sirf ayk hi kal ki kymt haay۔mzayd braan ، ayk tybl main sirf ayk bnyady klyd hawskty hay ، jabky ayk tybl main mtadd anwkhy chabyan hawskty hayn۔aakhr main ، ayk bnyady klyd khud bkhwd trtyb di jati hay aur poray dayta bys main ayk ryfrns klyd kay tawr par astamal hawty hay ، balkl isi tarah jesay wwlfrm | alfa 2 kwdanghsait 3 tychtarjt 4 astyk awwr flw 5 tychwpydaya kay zaryaha taakt sy tyar kya jata haay۔

Question: ghair mlky klyd aur chyk rkawt main kya frk haay؟
Answer: ghair mlky klyd aur chyk rkawt kay mabyn aham akhtlafat yeh hayn: ghair mlky klyd: ghair mlky klyd ayk kalm ya kalmwn ka ayk mjmwaha hay jo kesi aur tybl ki bnyady klyd sy mrad haay۔ ayk ghair mlky klyd main kaladm akdar par mushtamil hawskta hay ، lekin sirf is sawrt main jab wahan mwjwd ho ، lekin sirf is sawrt main hawskta haay۔kya is klyd par byan krdha koi rkawt nahin haay۔ ayk tybl main mtadd ghair mlky klydyn hawskty hayn۔ ayk ghair mlky klyd myzawn kay mabyn talkat kaim karnay kay liye astamal ki jati haay۔janch pratal ki janch pratal: ayk chyk rkawt ko kalm ya kalmwn kay ayk syt par byan kya jata hay takha akdar ki had ko mhadwd kya jaskay jo pehlay sy taay shuda haalt ka astamal karty hoey un kalmwn main dakhl kya jaskta haay۔ chyk rkawt dakhl ya trmym shuda akdar ka andazaha karnay kay liye aml main aaty hay ، jhaanwylyw ko chyk rkawt main byan krdha haalt ko pora karna zurwry haay۔ ayk tybl main mtadd chyk rkawtyn hawskty hayn۔ ayk chyk rkawt ko aadad wa shmar ki salmyt ko nafza karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay js ko kalm main dakhl kya jaskta haay۔ khlasaha ، ayk ghair mlky klyd aur aykchyk rkawt dono dayta bys main dayta ki salmyt ko nafza karnay kay liye astamal hawtay hayn۔an dono kay mabyn bnyady frk yeh hay keh ayk ghair mlky klyd ka astamal myzawn kay mabyn talkat kaim karnay aur hawalha denay wali salmyt ko nafza karnay kay liye kya jata hay ، jabky ayk chyk rkawt ka astamal akdar ki had ko mhadwd krkay dayta ki salmyt ko nafza karnay kay liye kya jata hay jo kalm main dakhl kya jaskta haay۔mzayd braan ، ayk tybl main mtadd ghair mlky chabyan aur mtadd chyk rkawtyn hawskty hayn۔aakhr main ، ayk ghair mlky klyd main kaladm akdar par mushtamil hawskta hay ، lekin sirf is sawrt main jab is klyd par koi rkawt nahin hay ، jabky chyk rkawt dakhl krdha ya trmym shuda akdar ka jaizaha lyty hay ، jahan kymt ko chyk rkawt main mkhsawsa haalt ko pora karna hawgha۔wwlfrm | alfa 2 ays kyw ayl shyk 3 jy ay ay ay ayksfwrjyks 4 ghwghl 5 jywrw 99

Question: NULL aur pehlay sy taay shuda rkawt kay darmiyan kya frk haay؟
Answer: nwl aur pehlay sy taay shuda rkawt kay darmiyan aham akhtlafat yeh hayn: kaladm nhayn: kalm main kaladm nahin ki rkawt ka astamal kalm main kaladm nahin haay۔tybl tyar karty wkt ya tybl main rdwbdl karty wkt kalm par is ki wzuahat ki jaskty haay۔ dyghr rkawtwn kay sath koi rkawt nahin astamal ki jaskty hay ، jesay praimry klyd ya anwkha۔ dayfalt rkawt: kalm kay liye dayfalt wylyw fraham karnay kay liye pehlay sy taay shuda rkawt ka astamal kya jata haay۔ksy kdr ki wzuahat nahin ki jati haay۔ jab kesi niy ktaar ko tybl main dakhl kya jata hay tou kesi kalm main dayfalt wylyw dakhl karnay kay liye pehlay sy taay shuda rkawt ka astamal kya jata haay۔ jab kesi tybl ki tshkyl ya tybl ko tbdyl karty wkt kalm par dayfalt rkawt ki wzuahat ki jaskty haay۔dyghr rkawtwn kay sath astamal kya jaye ، jesay bnyady klyd ya anwkha۔ khlasaha main ، ayk kaladm rkawt aur pehlay sy taay shuda rkawt dono ko dayta bys main dayta ki salmyt ko nafza karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔an dono kay mabyn bnyady frk yeh hay keh ayk kaladm rkawt is bat ko ykyny bnaty hay keh kalm ki kdr honi chahaiay ، jabky pehlay sy taay shuda rkawt kalm kay liye dayfalt wylyw fraham krty hay jab koi kdr ki wzuahat nahin ki jati haay۔azuafy tawr par ، dono rkawtwn ki wzuahat kalm par ki jaskty hay jab tybl bnatay ho ya kesi tybl ko tbdyl karty ho ، aur dono ko dyghr rkawtwn kay sath astamal kya jaskta hay ، jesay bnyady klyd ya anwkha۔

Question: ayk anwkha aur bnyady klydy rkawt main kya frk haay؟
Answer: yahan ayk anwkha aur bnyady klydy rkawt kay mabyn aham akhtlafat hayn: bnyady klydy rkawt: ayk bnyady klyd kalm ya kalmwn ka ayk mjmwaha hay jo hr ktaar ko tybl main mnfrd tawr par shnakht krta haay۔ ayk praimry klyd main kaladm akdar par mushtamil nahin hawskta haay۔ ayk tybl main hawskta haay۔aadad wa shmar ki salmyt ko nafza karnay aur jdwlwn kay mabyn talkat kaim karnay kay liye sirf ayk bnyady klyd ka astamal kya jata haay۔ ayk praimry klyd khud bkhwd asharyha sazay ki jati hay aur poray dayta bys main ayk ryfrns klyd kay tawr par astamal hawty haay۔ anwyk rkawt: ayk anwkha rkawt ayk kalm ya syt haay۔kalmwn main sy jo hr saf ko ayk jdwl main alag alag shnakht karty hayn۔ ayk mnfrd rkawt main kaladm akdar par mushtamil hawskta hay ، lekin fy kalm main sirf ayk hi naly kdr haay۔ ayk tybl main ayk sy zayada anwkhy rkawtyn hawskty hayn۔ aadad wa shmar ki salmyt ko nafza karnay aur jdwlwn kay mabyn talkat kaim karnay kay liye ayk anwkha rkawt astamal ki jati haay۔. ayk mnfrd rkawt khud bkhwd trtyb di jati hay aur poray dayta bys main ayk hawalha klyd kay tawr par astamal hawty haay۔ khlasaha main ، ayk bnyady klydy rkawt aur ayk anwkha rkawt dono ko dayta ki salmyt ko nafza karnay aur jdwlwn kay mabyn talkat kaim karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔an dono kay mabyn bnyady frk yeh hay keh ayk bnyady klyd ayk myza main hr saf ki anfrady tawr par shnakht krty hay aur is main kaladm akdar par mushtamil nahin hawskta hay ، jabky ayk anwkha rkawt ayk myza main hr ktaar ki anfradyt sy shnakht krty hay aur is main kalm wali kymtwn par mushtamil hawskta hay ، lekin fy kalm main sirf ayk hi naly kdr haay۔mzayd braan ، ayk tybl main sirf ayk bnyady klyd hawskty hay ، jabky ayk tybl main mtadd anwkhy rkawtyn hawskty hayn۔aakhr main ، ayk bnyady klyd khud bkhwd trtyb di jati hay aur poray dayta bys main ayk hawalha klyd kay tawr par astamal hawty hay ، balkl isi tarah jesay ayk anwkhy rkawt۔

Question: chyk aur ghair mlky klydy rkawt main kya frk haay؟
Answer: yahan chyk aur ghair mlky klydy rkawt kay mabyn aham akhtlafat hayn: chyk rkawt: chyk rkawt ki wzuahat kalm ya kalmwn kay ayk syt par ki jati hay takha akdar ki had ko mhadwd kya jaskay jo pehlay sy taay shuda haalt ka astamal karty hoey un kalmwn main dakhl kya jaskta haay۔ ayk chykdakhl krdha ya trmym shuda akdar ka andazaha karnay kay liye rkawt aml main aaty hay ، jahan kymt ko chyk rkawt main byan ki hogi haalt ko pora karna zurwry haay۔ ayk tybl main mtadd chyk rkawtyn hawskty hayn۔ ayk chyk rkawt ka astamal un akdar ki had ko mhadwd krkay dayta ki salmyt ko nafza karnay kay liye kya jata haay۔kalm main dakhl kryn۔as klyd par byan krdha۔ ayk jdwl main mtadd ghair mlky klydy rkawtyn hawskty hayn۔ ayk ghair mlky klydy rkawt ko myzawn kay mabyn talkat kaim karnay aur ryfrnl salmyt ko nafza karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ ayk ghair mlky klydy rkawt khud bkhwd trtyb di jati hay aur poray dayta bys main ayk hawalha klyd kay tawr par astamal hawty haay۔ khlasaha۔، ayk chyk rkawt aur ghair mlky klydy rkawt dono ko dayta bys main dayta ki salmyt ko nafza karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔an dono kay mabyn bnyady frk yeh hay keh chyk ki rkawt akdar ki had ko mhadwd krty hay jo pehlay sy taay shuda haalt ka astamal karty hoey kalm main dakhl ki jaskty hay ، jabky ghair mlky klydy rkawt myzawn kay mabyn talkat kaim krty hay aur hawalha denay wali salmyt ko nafza krty haay۔mzayd braan ، ayk jdwl main mtadd chyk rkawtyn aur mtadd ghair mlky klydy rkawtyn hawskty hain ، aur ayk ghair mlky klydy rkawt main kaladm akdar par mushtamil hawskta hay ، lekin sirf is sawrt main jab is klyd par koi kaladm rkawt nahin hay ، jabky chyk rkawt dakhl krdha ya trmym shuda akdar ka jaizaha lyty hay ،jhaan kymt ko chyk rkawt main byan krdha haalt ko pora karna hawgha۔aakhr main ، ayk ghair mlky klydy rkawt khud bkhwd trtyb di jati hay aur poray dayta bys main ayk ryfrns klyd kay tawr par astamal hawty hay ، jabky chyk ki rkawt ko asharyha nahin kya jata haay۔

Question: NULL aur pehlay sy taay shuda rkawt kay darmiyan kya frk haay؟
Answer: nwl aur pehlay sy taay shuda rkawt kay darmiyan aham akhtlafat yeh hayn: kaladm nhayn: kal kalm main NULL akdar ko dakhl karnay ko rwknay kay liye NULL rkawt ka astamal nahin kya jata haay۔ A NULL rkawt is bat ko ykyny bnata hay keh kalm ki kdr haw۔ayk sy zayada nahin kaladm rkawtyn۔ A aadad wa shmar ki salmyt ko nafza karnay kay liye kaladm rkawt ka astamal nahin kya jata haay۔ dayfalt rkawt: jab kesi kdr ki wzuahat nahin ki jati hay tou kalm kay liye dayfalt wylyw fraham karnay kay liye pehlay sy taay shuda rkawt ka astamal kya jata haay۔kalm jab ayk niy ktaar ko tybl main dakhl kya jata haay۔ ayk tybl main mtadd pehlay sy taay shuda rkawtyn hawskty hayn۔ aadad wa shmar ki salmyt ko nafza karnay kay liye dayfalt rkawt ka astamal kya jata haay۔ khlasaha main ، ayk kaladm rkawt aur pehlay sy taay shuda rkawt dono ko dayta bys main dayta ki salmyt ko nafza karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔an dono kay mabyn bnyady frk yeh hay keh ayk kaladm rkawt is bat ko ykyny bnaty hay keh kalm ki kdr honi chahaiay ، jabky pehlay sy taay shuda rkawt kalm kay liye dayfalt wylyw fraham krty hay jab koi kdr ki wzuahat nahin ki jati haay۔mzayd braan ، dono rkawtwn ko kalm par byan kya jaskta hay ، aur dono ko dyghr rkawtwn kay sath astamal kya jaskta hay ، jesay bnyady klyd ya anwkha۔aakhr main ، ayk tybl main mtadd nah hony wali rkawtyn aur ayk sy zayada pehlay sy taay shuda rkawtyn hawskty hayn۔

Question: ayk chhwta sa tybl aur byan sy hazaf karnay main kya frk haay؟
Answer: yahan ayk chhwta sa tybl aur byan sy hazaf karnay kay darmiyan aham akhtlafat yeh hayn: trnkyt tybl: trnkyt tybl ayk day day ayl (dayta dayfynyshn lynghwyj) kmanda haay۔ trnkyt tybl tybl sy tamam ktaaryn hatata haay۔ trnkyt tybl ko hazaf karnay sy tyza tr hay kywnkha yeh hazaf nahin krta haay۔har ktaar ko hazaf karnay kay liye tybl ko dwbarha nahin lghaya jaskta۔ tybl ko dwbarha trtyb nahin diya jaskta۔ tybl ki shnakht ko dwbarha trtyb dyn۔ tybl ki tamam ktaaryn jldy sy hatanay kay liye tybl ka astamal kya jata haay۔jhaan sy ayk ya ayk sy zayada ktaarwn ko hatata hay js ki bnyad par ki hogi haalt ki bnyad par ayk ya zayada ktaaryn۔.daylyt ka astamal tybl sy mkhsawsa ktaarwn ko door karnay kay liye kya jata haay۔ khlasaha ، ayk chhwta sa tybl aur byan sy hazaf karnay waly dono ko dayta bys main tybl sy dayta ko hatanay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔an dono kay darmiyan bnyady frk yeh hay keh trashay hoey tybl ayk myza sy tamam ktaaryn hatata hay ، jabky shk main mkhsawsa haalt ki bnyad par ayk myza sy ayk ya zayada ktaaryn hatata haay۔mzayd braan ، trnkyt tybl hazaf karnay sy tyza tr hay kywnkha yeh hr ktaar ko hazaf karnay main lagh un nahin hawta hay ، lekin isy waps nahin laya jaskta hay ، aur yeh tybl ki shnakht ko dwbarha syt krta haay۔dwsry taraf ، daylyt tybl sy zayada aahastha hay kywnkha yeh hr saf ko hazaf karnay ko lagh un krta hay ، lekin isy waps lpyta jaskta hay ، aur yeh tybl ki shnakht ko dwbarha trtyb nahin dyta haay۔aakhr main ، trnkyt tybl ko tybl sy tamam ktaaryn jldy sy hatanay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، jabky hazaf ko tybl sy mkhsawsa ktaarwn ko hatanay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔

Question: tkhlyk tybl aur darap tybl kay byan main kya frk haay؟
Answer: ayk tkhlyk tybl aur ayk darap tybl byan kay mabyn aham akhtlafat yeh hayn: tybl bnaiyn: tybl bnaiyn ayk day day ayl (dayta dayfynyshn lynghwyj) kmanda haay۔ kryt tybl ko dayta bys main ayk nya tybl bnanay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔tybl ، kalm ، aur un kay dayta ki ksmyn۔ tkhlyk tybl main rkawtyn shaml hawskty hain ، jesay bnyady klyd ، anwkha ، NULL nahin ، aur ghair mlky klyd۔ kryt tybl ko dayta kay sath ya is kay baghair tybl bnanay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔ darap tybl: darap tybl hay haay۔ayk day day ayl (dayta dayfynyshn lynghwyj) kmanda۔ darwp tybl ko dayta bys sy tybl hatanay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ darwp tybl tybl ko hazaf krdyta hay aur is ka tamam dayta۔ darap tybl ko waps nahin kya jaskta haay۔ darap tybl ko dayta bys sy tybl hatanay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔khlasaha yeh keh ، ayk tkhlyk tybl aur ayk darap tybl byan dono ko dayta bys main trmym karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔dwnwn kay darmiyan bnyady frk yeh hay keh tybl tkhlyk ka astamal dayta bys main ayk nya tybl bnanay kay liye kya jata hay ، jabky darap tybl ko dayta bys sy tybl ko hatanay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔mzayd braan ، tybl bnaiyn tybl ka nam ، kalmwn aur un kay dayta ki aksam ki wzuahat krta hay ، aur is main rkawtyn shaml hawskty hain ، jesay bnyady klyd ، anwkha ، NULL nahin aur ghair mlky klyd۔dwsry taraf ، darap tybl tybl ko hazaf krdyta hay aur is kay tamam dayta ko waps nahin laya jaskta hay ، aur isy dayta bys sy tybl hatanay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔aakhr main ، dono kmandaza day day ayl (dayta dayfynyshn lynghwyj) kmanda hayn۔

Question: tkhlyk dayta bys aur darap dayta bys kay byan main kya frk haay؟
Answer: ayk tkhlyk dayta bys aur ayk darap dayta bys byan kay mabyn aham akhtlafat yeh hayn: dayta bys bnaiyn: dayta bys bnaiyn ayk day day ayl (dayta dayfynyshn lynghwyj) kmanda haay۔ kryt dayta bys ko dayta bys mynjmnt sstm main ayk nya dayta bys bnanay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ kryt dayta bys nam ki wzuahat krta haay۔dayta bys aur is ki khsawsayat main say۔ tkhlyk shuda dayta bys main kryktr syt ، kwlyshn ، aur fail lwkyshnza jesay akhtyarat shaml hawsktay hayn۔ kryt dayta bys ko dayta bys mynjmnt sstm main nya dayta bys bnanay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ darap dayta bys: darap dayta bys ayk day day ayl hay (dayta dayfynyshn lynghwyj) kmanda.darwp dayta bys ko dayta bys mynjmnt sstm sy dayta bys ko hatanay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ darwp dayta bys dayta bys aur is ki tamam ashyaa ، jesay tyblza ، wywza ، aur astwrda tarykha kar ko hazaf krta haay۔ darap dayta bys ko rwlda nahin kya jaskta haay۔ darwp dayta bys ko hatanay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔dayta bys mynjmnt sstm ka ayk dayta bys۔ khlasaha ، ayk tkhlyk dayta bys aur ayk darap dayta bys byan dono ko dayta bys mynjmnt sstm main trmym karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔an dono kay mabyn bnyady frk yeh hay keh dayta bys ko dayta bys mynjmnt sstm main ayk nya dayta bys bnanay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، jabky darap dayta bys ko dayta bys mynjmnt sstm sy dayta bys ko hatanay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔mzayd braan ، dayta bys bnaiyn dayta bys aur is ki khsawsayat ka nam btata hay ، aur is main kryktr syt ، kwlyshn ، aur fail kay mkamat jesay akhtyarat shaml hawsktay hayn۔dwsry taraf ، darap dayta bys dayta bys aur is ki tamam ashyaa ، jesay tyblza ، aaraa ، aur zakhyrha shuda tarykha kar ko hazaf krdyta hay ، isy waps nahin kya jaskta ، aur dayta bys mynjmnt sstm sy dayta bys ko hatanay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔aakhr main ، dono kmandaza day day ayl (dayta dayfynyshn lynghwyj) kmanda hayn۔

Question: byk ap dayta bys aur bhaaly dayta bys kay byan main kya frk haay؟
Answer: byk ap dayta bys aur bhaaly dayta bys kay byan kay darmiyan aham akhtlafat yeh hayn: byk ap dayta bys: byk ap dayta bys ayk kmanda hay jo dayta bys ka byk ap bnanay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔ byk ap dayta bys dayta bys aur is kay aabjykt ، jesay jdwlwn ، nzaaray ، ki ayk kapy tyar krta haay۔awr zakhyrha shuda tarykha kar۔ byk ap dayta bys ko mkml byk ap ، ayk tfryk byk ap ، ya tranzaykshn lagh byk ap bnanay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔ byk ap dayta bys ays kyw ayl srwr mynjmnt astwdayw ، tranzaykt ays kyw ayl ، ya pawr shyl۔ byk ap dayta bys ko dayta ki hafazat kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔mkhtlf ksm ki nakamywn ki wjha sy dayta kay nksaan kay khlaf۔ ryzawr dayta bys: dayta bys ko byk ap sy dayta bys ko bhaal karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ ryzawr dayta bys dayta bys aur is ki ashyaa ، jesay tyblza ، wywza ، aur zakhyrha shuda tarykha kar ki ayk kapy ko bhaal krta haay۔dayta bys ka astamal mkml byk ap ، ayk tfryk byk ap ، ya tranzaykshn lagh byk ap ko bhaal karnay kay liye kya jaskta haay۔ rysstwr dayta bys ays kyw ayl srwr mynjmnt astwdayw ، tranzaykt ays kyw ayl ، ya pawr shyl ka astamal karty hoey anjam diya jaskta haay۔ rysrstwr dayta bys ko byk ap sy dayta bazayaft karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔aadad wa shmar kay nksaan ya bdanwany kay khlasaay main ، ayk byk ap dayta bys aur bhaaly dayta bys kay byan ko dayta bys mynjmnt sstm main dayta ki hafazat kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔dwnwn kay darmiyan bnyady frk yeh hay keh byk ap dayta bys dayta bys ka byk ap bnata hay ، jabky dayta bys ko bhaal karain byk ap sy dayta bys ko bhaal krta haay۔mzayd braan ، byk ap dayta bys dayta bys aur is kay aabjykt ki ayk kapy tyar krta hay ، jesay tyblza ، aaraa ، aur zakhyrha shuda tarykha kar ، aur ayk mkml byk ap ، ayk tfryk byk ap ، ya tranzaykshn lagh byk ap bnanay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔dwsry taraf ، dayta bys ko bhaal karain dayta bys aur is ki ashyaa ، jesay tyblza ، aaraa ، aur zakhyrha shuda tarykha kar ki ayk kapy ko bhaal krta hay ، aur isy mkml byk ap ، tfryk byk ap ، ya tranzaykshn lagh byk ap ko bhaal karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔aakhr main ، dono kmandaza ays kyw ayl srwr mynjmnt astwdayw ، tranzaykt ays kyw ayl ، ya pawr shyl ka astamal karty hoey anjam dyiay jasktay hain ، aur mkhtlf ksm ki nakamywn ki wjha sy dayta nksaan sy dayta ko bchanay kay liye astamal hawtay hayn۔

Question: ghrant aur mnswkh karnay waly byan main kya frk haay؟
Answer: yahan ghrant aur mnswkh karnay waly byan kay mabyn aham akhtlafat hayn: ghrant byan: ghrant ayk day sy ayl (dayta kntrwl lynghwyj) kmanda haay۔ ghrant saarfyn ko dayta bys main aapryshnza tak rsaiy aur anjam denay ki ajazat fraham karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ ghrant kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔ksy saarf ko ajazat ، saarfyn kay ayk ghrwp ، ya kesi rwl. ghrant ko kesi tybl par ajazat denay kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay ، ayk nzaarha ، zakhyrha shuda tarykha kar ، ya dayta bys۔ ghrant ko dayta bys main mraaat par kabw panay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ayk day sy ayl (dayta kntrwl lynghwyj) kmanda haay۔ rywk ko saarf ، saarfyn kay ayk ghrwp ، ya kesi krdar sy ajazatyn door karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ rywky ko tybl ، ayk nzaarha ، zakhyrha shuda tarykha kar ، ya dayta bys par ajazat ko kaladm karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔.jrk ko dayta bys main mraaat par kabw panay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ khlasaha۔an dono kay darmiyan bnyady frk yeh hay keh ghrant ko dayta bys main saarfyn tak rsaiy aur kam karnay ki ajazat fraham karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، jabky rywwk ka astamal saarf ، saarfyn kay ayk ghrwp ya kesi krdar sy ajazat ko door karnay kay liye kya jata haay۔mzayd braan ، ghrant ko tybl ، ayk nzaarha ، zakhyrha shuda tarykha kar ، ya dayta bys par ajazat denay kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay ، aur dayta bys main mraaat par kabw panay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔dwsry taraf ، mnswkh karnay ka astamal kesi tybl ، ayk nzaaray ، zakhyrha shuda tarykha kar ، ya dayta bys par ajazatwn ko kaladm karnay kay liye kya jaskta hay ، aur isy dayta bys main mraaat par kabw panay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔aakhr main ، dono kmandaza day sy ayl (dayta kntrwl lynghwyj) kmanda hayn۔

Question: flsh mraaat aur flsh tyblza kay byan main kya frk haay؟
Answer: yahan flsh mraaat aur flsh tyblza kay byan kay mabyn aham akhtlafat hayn: flsh mraaat: flsh mraaat ayk kmanda hay jo ays kyw ayl main ghrant tybl ko dwbarha lwda karnay kay liye astamal ki jati haay۔ flsh mraaat ka astamal srwr ko mraaat ki un mymwry kapy ko dwbarha lwda karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔asthakak ki myzayn۔ flsh mraaat ko ykyny bnanay kay liye astamal kya jata hay keh ghrant tybl main tbdylywn ka asar prata haay۔ flsh mraaat ays kyw ayl kay byanat ، jesay flsh mraaat ، ya kmanda lain twlza ka astamal karty hoey anjam di jaskty hain ، jesay maikladamyn flsh-praiywylyza ya askldamyn rylwda۔flsh mraaat ko ays kyw ayl main ghrant tyblza ko dwbarha lwda karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ays kyw ayl kay byanat ، jesay flsh tyblza ، ya kmanda lain twlza ka astamal karty hoey ، jesay myskldamyn flsh tyblza ya myskldamyn ryfrysh ka astamal karty hoey anjam diya jaiay۔ flsh tyblza ko dayta bys main tamam jdwlwn ko band karnay aur dwbarha khwlnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔flsh tyblza ka byan dono ays kyw ayl dayta bys main trmym karnay kay liye astamal hawtay hayn۔dwnwn kay darmiyan bnyady frk yeh hay keh flsh mraaat ka astamal ays kyw ayl main ghrant tyblza ko dwbarha lwda karnay kay liye kya jata hay ، jabky flsh tyblza ko dayta bys main tamam tyblza ko band karnay aur dwbarha khwlnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔mzayd braan ، flsh mraaat ka astamal is bat ko ykyny bnanay kay liye kya jata hay keh ghrant tyblwn main hony wali tbdylywn ka asar prata hay ، jabky flsh tyblza ko is bat ka ykyn karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay keh myzawn main tamam tbdylyan dask par lkhy ghiyn۔aakhr main ، dono kmandaza ays kyw ayl kay byanat ، jesay flsh mraaat ya flsh tyblza ، ya kmanda lain twlza ، jesay myskldamyn flsh praiywylyjza ، myskldamyn rylwda ، myskldamyn rylwda ، ya askldamyn ryfryshl flashwr flsh .1 myss ayl 2 myskl 3 asttwrsh۔

Question: shw tyblza aur tybl kay byan ki wzuahat kay darmiyan kya frk haay؟
Answer: yahan ayk shw tyblza aur ayk tybl byan ki wzuahat kay darmiyan aham akhtlafat hayn: shw tyblza: shw tyblza ayk kmanda hay jo tyblza ko dayta bys main fharst main lanay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔ shw tyblza ko dyiay gaye dayta bys main ghair aarzuy jdwlwn ki fharst di jati haay۔ shw tybl astamal ki jaskty hayn۔dayta bys main jdwlwn kay liye tybl ki ksm ، malk ، aur tkhmynay wali ktaar ki ghnty ko zaahar karnay kay liay۔ shw tybl ays kyw ayl kay byanat ، jesay shw tyblza ، ya kmanda lain twlza ka astamal karty hoey anjam dyiay jasktay hain ، jesay maiy ays kyw ayl ays aych aw ya maiy ays kyw ayl۔ shw tybl astamal kya jata haay۔jdwlwn ko dayta bys main fharst bnanay kay liay۔ tybl ki wzuahat kryn: tybl ki wzuahat ayk tybl ki sakht ko zaahar karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ tybl ko tybl kay liye kalm kay nam ، dayta ki aksam aur rkawtwn ko zaahar krta haay۔ dayskraib tybl ays kyw ayl kay byanat ka astamal karty hoey anjam diya jaskta hay ،jysay tybl ki wzuahat karain ، ya kmanda lain twlza ka astamal karty hoey ، jesay maiy ays kyw ayl ays aych aw ya ays kyw ayl۔ dayskraib tybl ko tybl ki sakht ko zaahar karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ khlasaha yeh hay keh ayk shw tyblza aur ayk tybl byan dono ays kyw ayl dayta bys sy astfsar karnay kay liye astamal kyay jatay hayn۔dwnwn kay darmiyan bnyady frk yeh hay keh shw tyblza ko dayta bys main tybl ki fharst kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، jabky tybl ki sakht ko zaahar karnay kay liye tybl ka astamal kya jata haay۔mzayd braan ، shw tyblza kesi dyiay gaye dayta bys main ghair aarzuy jdwlwn ki fharst dytay hain ، aur dayta bys main jdwlwn kay liye tybl ki ksm ، malk ، aur tkhmynha shuda ktaar ki ghnty ko zaahar karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay ، jabky tybl ki wzuahat kalm kay nam ، dayta ki aksam ، aur dkhaty haay۔ayk myza kay liye rkawtyn۔aakhr main ، dono kmandaza ays kyw ayl kay byanat ka astamal karty hoey anjam dyiay jasktay hain ، jesay tyblza dkhaiyn ya tybl ki wzuahat karain ، ya kmanda lain twlza ka astamal karain ، jesay maiy ays kyw ayl ays aych ayl۔

Question: shw kay dayta bys aur astamal kay dayta bys kay byan main kya frk haay؟
Answer: yahan ayk shw dayta bys aur astamal dayta bys kay byan kay mabyn aham akhtlafat hayn: dayta bys dkhaiyn: dayta bys ayk kmanda hay jo ayk ays kyw ayl srwr par dstyab dayta bys ki fharst kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ shw dayta bys ayk dyiay gaye ays kyw ayl srwr main ghair aarzuy dayta bys ki fharst dyta haay۔ays kyw ayl srwr main dayta bys kay liye dayta bys ki ksm ، malk ، aur aw ya maiy ays kyw ayl ka astamal karty hoey anjam diya jaskta haay۔dkhaiyn dayta bys ko ays kyw ayl srwr par dstyab dayta bys ki fharst kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔، jesay astamal dayta bys ، ya dayta bys kay byan dono ko ays kyw ayl dayta bys sy astfsar karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔dwnwn kay darmiyan bnyady frk yeh hay keh shw dayta bys ko ays kyw ayl srwr par dstyab dayta bys ki fharst kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، jabky astamal dayta bys kay sath kam karnay kay liye dayta bys ko mntkhb karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔mzayd braan ، dayta bys ko dkhaya gaya hay kesi dyiay gaye ays kyw ayl srwr main ghair aarzuy dayta bys ki fharst hay ، aur is ko ays kyw ayl srwr main dayta bys kay liye dayta bys ki ksm ، malk ، aur tkhmynay wali ktaar ki ghnty ko zaahar karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay ، jabky astamal dayta bys kay bad kay ays kyw ayl kay liye dayfalt dayta bys syt krta haay۔byanataakhr main ، dono kmandaza ays kyw ayl kay byanat ka astamal karty hoey Question: shw ghrant aur shw mtghyr kay byan main kya frk haay؟
Answer: yahan ayk shw ghrant aur shw mtghyr byan kay mabyn aham akhtlafat hayn: ghrant dkhaiyn: ghrant ayk kmanda hay jo kesi khasa saarf ko dyiay gaye mraaat ya kesi Mysql dayta bys main krdar ko zaahar karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔ shw ghrant main ghrant kay byan ya byanat ki fharst hay js main zurwry haay۔ays kyw ayl saarf akaؤnt ko dyiay janay waly mraaat ki nkl kay liye jary kya jaiay۔ shw ghrants ays kyw ayl kay byanat ، jesay shw ghrant ، ya kmanda lain twlza ، jesay ays kyw ayl ya maiy ays kyw ayl ays aych aw kay astamal sy anjam dyiay jasktay hayn۔ mraaat ko dykhnay kay liye shw ghrant astamal kya jata haay۔ays kyw ayl dayta bys main saarf ya krdar ko ataa krdha۔ays kyw ayl kay byanat ka astamal karty hoey ، jesay mtghyrat ، ya kmanda lain twlza ka astamal ، jesay ays kyw ayl ya maiy ays kyw ays aych aw۔ shw mtghyrat ko ays kyw ayl dayta bys main sstm mtghyr ki mwjwdha akdar ko dykhnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ khlasaha ، ayk shw ghrant aur shw mtghyratbyan dono ko ays kyw ayl dayta bys sy astfsar karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔dwnwn kay darmiyan bnyady frk yeh hay keh shw ghrant kesi khasa saarf ko dyiay gaye mraaat ya kesi ays kyw ayl dayta bys main krdar ko zaahar karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، jabky shw mtghyrat ko ays kyw ayl dayta bys main sstm kay mtghyrat ko zaahar karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔mzayd braan ، ghrant ki fharst main ghrant kay byan ya byanat ki fharst di jati hay jo mraaat ko nkl karnay kay liye jary ki jany chahaiay jo ays kyw ayl saarf akaؤnt ko dyiay jatay hain ، jabky mtghyrat main ays kyw ayl dayta bys main sstm mtghyr ki mwjwdha akdar ki fharst di hogi haay۔aakhr main ، dono kmandaza ays kyw ayl kay byanat ka astamal karty hoey anjam dyiay jasktay hain ، jesay ghrant dkhaiyn ya mtghyrat ko dkhaiyn ، ya kmanda lain twlza ، jesay maiy ays kyw ayl ya maiy ays kyw ayl shaؤ۔

Question: bwlyn aur tnyynt dayta ki ksm main kya frk haay؟
Answer: yahan bwlyn aur tyny ant dayta ki ksm kay darmiyan aham akhtlafat hayn: bwlyn: bwlyn ayk dayta ki ksm hay jo sahayha/ghlta akdar ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔ bwwlyn ays kyw ayl main dayta ki ksm nahin hay ، lekin yeh tnyint (1) ka mtradf haay۔ bwwlyn۔sahayha/ghlta akdar ko zayada bdyhay andaza main zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔ bwwlyn ko un swalat ko aasan bnanay kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay jn main sahayha/ghlta akdar shaml hawn۔ tyny ant: tyny ant: tyny ant antyjr akdar ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔jhwtay akdar ko 0 aur ghalat kay liye 1 ka astamal karty hawiay۔ tynyint ko 1 bait astwryj ki zurwrt hawty hay ، jabky bwlyn ko 1 bt astwryj ki zurwrt hawty haay۔ tyny ant ko dusray antyjr akdar ko schay/ghlta kay alawha astamal kya jaskta haay۔taip dono ko ays kyw ayl dayta bys main sahayha/ghlta akdar ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔an dono kay darmiyan bnyady frk yeh hay keh bwlyn ays kyw ayl main dayta ki ksm nahin hay ، lekin yeh tnyint (1) ka mtradf hay ، jabky tainnt ayk dayta taip hay jo addy akdar ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔mzayd braan ، bwlyn ka astamal hakyky/ghlta akdar ko zayada bdyhay andaza main zakhyrha karnay aur un swalat ko aasan bnanay kay liye kya jaskta hay jn main sahayha/ghlta akdar shaml hon ، jabky tainynt ko sahayha/ghlta kay alawha dyghr addy akdar ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay aur is main astwryj ki 1 bait ki zurwrt hawty hay ، jabky is main 1 bait ki zurwrt hawty haay۔bwlyn ko 1 bt astwryj ki zurwrt haay۔aakhr main ، dono aadad wa shmar ki aksam ko sahayha/ghlta akdar ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay ، lekin bwlyn zayada bdyhay hay aur is kay liye tyny aynt sy kam astwryj ki zurwrt haay۔

Question: INT aur BIGINT dayta ki ksm main kya frk haay؟
Answer: yahan ayk INT aur ayk braay dayta ki ksm kay darmiyan aham akhtlafat hayn: INT: INT aadad wa shmar ki ksm hay jo addy akdar ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔ INT -2،147،483،648 aur 2،147،483،647 kay darmiyan akdar ko zakhyrha krskta haay۔ astwryj kay 4 baits ki zurwrt hawty haay۔antyjr wylywza۔ byghnt: bghynt ayk dayta ki ksm hay jo braay antyjr akdar ko mhafwza karnay kay liye astamal hawty haay۔ byghnt akdar ko -9،223،372،036،854،775،808 aur 9،223،372،036،854،75،807 kay liye ayk antrwyj aur 9،223،372،036،854،75،807.bigint ki zurwrt haay۔bghynt dayta ki ksm dono ko ays kyw ayl dayta bys main addy akdar ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔an dono kay mabyn bnyady frk yeh hay keh INT ko chhwty antyjr akdar ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، jabky bghynt bray addy akdar ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔mzayd braan ، INT -2،147،483،648 aur 2،147،483،647 kay darmiyan akdar ko zakhyrha krskta hay ، aur is main 4 baits astwryj ki zurwrt hawty hay ، jabky bghnt -9،223،372،036،854،775،808 aur 9،223،372،036،854،854،854،854،854،854،854،854،854،854،854،8075 daalr kay darmiyan akdar ko zakhyrha krsktay hayn۔aakhr main ، dono aadad wa shmar ki aksam ko addy akdar ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay ، lekin INT chhwty akdar kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، jabky bghynt bray akdar kay liye astamal hawta haay۔

Question: tarykh aur dayt taim dayta ki ksm main kya frk haay؟
Answer: yahan tarykh aur dayt taim dayta ki ksm kay darmiyan aham akhtlafat yeh hayn: tarykh: tarykh ayk dayta ki ksm hay jo tarykh kay baghair tarykh ki akdar ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal hawty haay۔.dayt kay liye 3 baits astwryj ki zurwrt hawty haay۔ tarykh sirf tarykh aur wkt ki kymt kay tarykh kay hasaay ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal ki jati haay۔ dayt taim: dayt taim ayk dayta taip hay jo tarykh aur wkt ki kdrwn ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔ dayta taim '1000-01-01 kay darmiyan akdar ko zakhyrha krskta haay۔00:00:00 'awr' 9999-12-31 23: 59: 59'.datime kay liye 8 baits astwryj ki zurwrt hawty haay۔ tarykh aur wkt ki kymt aur wkt ki kymt aur wkt ki kymt kay dono hasawn ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ khlasaha ، tarykh main ، ayk tarykhawr dayta taim dayta ki ksm dono ko ays kyw ayl dayta bys main tarykh aur wkt ki akdar ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔an dono kay mabyn bnyady frk yeh hay keh tarykh aur wkt ki kymt kay sirf tarykh kay hasaay ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، jabky dayt taim ka astamal tarykh aur wkt ki kymt kay tarykh aur wkt dono hasawn ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye kya jata haay۔azuafy tawr par ، tarykh '1000-01-01' aur '9999-12-31' kay darmiyan akdar ko zakhyrha krskty hay ، aur is main 3 baits astwryj ki zurwrt hawty hay ، jabky dayt taim '1000-01-01 00:00:00:00' aur 'kay darmiyan akdar ko zakhyrha krskta haay۔9999-12-31 23:59:59 '، aur is kay liye 8 baits astwryj ki zurwrt haay۔aakhr main ، dono aadad wa shmar ki aksam ko tarykh aur wkt ki akdar ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay ، lekin tarykh sirf tarykh kay hasaay ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal ki jati hay ، jabky dayt taim ko tarykh aur wkt dono ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔

Question: ayk wkt aur taim astymp dayta ki ksm main kya frk haay؟
Answer: yahan ayk wkt aur taim astymp dayta ki ksm kay darmiyan aham akhtlafat yeh hayn: wkt: wkt kay baghair wkt ki kymtwn ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye wkt ka wkt astamal kya jata haay۔'. taim kay liye 3 baits astwryj ki zurwrt hawty haay۔ wkt ka astamal sirf ayk tarykh aur wkt ki kymt kay wkt kay hasaay ko astwr karnay kay liye kya jata haay۔ taim astymp: taim astymp ayk dayta taip hay jo tarykh aur wkt ki kdrwn ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔ taim astymp' 1970-01 kay darmiyan akdar ko zakhyrha krskta haay۔01 00:00:01 'awr' 2038-01-19 03: 14: 07'.Timestamp main 4 baits astwryj ki zurwrt hawty haay۔ taim astymp tarykh aur wkt ki kymt kay tarykh aur wkt dono hasawn ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔ khlasaha ، aykwkt aur taim astymp dayta ki ksm dono ko ays kyw ayl dayta bys main wkt ki akdar ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔an dono kay mabyn bnyady frk yeh hay keh wkt ka astamal tarykh aur wkt ki kymt kay sirf wkt kay hasaay ko mhafwza karnay kay liye kya jata hay ، jabky taim astymp tarykh aur wkt ki kymt kay tarykh aur wkt dono hasawn ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔azuafy tawr par ، wkt '-838: 59: 59' aur '838: 59: 59' kay darmiyan akdar ko zakhyrha krskta hay ، aur is main 3 baits astwryj ki zurwrt hawty hay ، jabky taim astymp '1970-01-01 00:00:01' kay darmiyan akdar ko zakhyrha krskta haay۔'2038-01-19 03:14:07' ، aur 4 baits astwryj ki zurwrt haay۔aakhr main ، dono dayta ki aksam ko wkt ki akdar ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay ، lekin wkt sirf wkt kay hasaay ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، jabky taim astymp tarykh aur wkt dono ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔

Question: aynwm aur syt dayta ki ksm main kya frk haay؟

Answer: yahan ayk bty aur haysh andayks kay mabyn aham akhtlafat hayn: by ty aar ay: by ty aar ay ayk ksm ka andayks hay jo dayta ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye mtwazan drkhtwn kay dayta dahanchay ka astamal krta haay۔ by ty aar ay rynj swalat aur chhantnay wali karrwaiywn kay liye bhatryn mwzawn haay۔ayk aaly kardanlty ، is ka mtalb hay keh kalm main akdar mnfrd hayn۔ zayada tr dayta bys sstm main pehlay sy taay shuda asharyha ki ksm haay۔ by ty aar ay haysh andayks sy zayada lchkdar hay aur hadwd ko snbhal sakta haay۔ by ty aar ay bhatryn tlash aur andraj kay awkat ki pysh ksh krta hay jab sahayha tawr par tshkyl kya jata haay۔ hash:haysh ayk ksm ka andayks hay jo dayta ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye haysh tybl dayta dahanchha astamal krta haay۔ haysh msawat kay swalat kay l best bhatryn mwzawn hay ، is ka mtalb yeh hay keh kalm main akdar mnfrd nahin hayn۔kalm main kdryn anwkhy nahin hayn۔as ki klyd ki lmbaiy ki hadwd hain jo is ko astwr krsktay hayn۔ khlasaha aur haysh ays kyw ayl main do mkhtlf ksm kay asharyha jat hain jo mkhtlf mkasad kay liye astamal hawtay hayn۔an dono kay mabyn bnyady frk yeh hay keh by ty aar ay dayta ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye mtwazan drkhtwn kay aadad wa shmar ka dahanchha astamal krta hay aur rynj kay swalat aur chhantnay ki karrwaiywn kay liye bhatryn mwzawn hay ، jabky haysh dayta ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye haysh tybl dayta dahanchha astamal krta hay aur msawat kay swalat kay liye bhatryn mwzawn haay۔mzayd braan ، BTREE kalmwn kay liye astamal kya jata hay jn main aaly kardanlty hawty hay ، jabky haysh kalmwn kay liye astamal hawty hay jn main kardanlty kam hawty haay۔BTREE haysh sy zayada lchkdar hay aur hadwd ko snbhal sakta hay ، jabky haysh kesi bhi ksm kay drkhtwn kay aadad wa shmar kay dahanchay ko abwr karnay ki zurwrt kay baghair tlash ki janay wali klydy akdar ka ptha lghaskty haay۔aakhr main ، BTREE zayada tr dayta bys sstm main pehlay sy taay shuda andayks ksm hay ، jabky haysh ki klyd ki lmbaiy ki hadwd hayn۔

Question: fl tykst aur jn andayks main kya frk haay؟
Answer: yahan ayk fl tykst aur jn andayks kay mabyn aham akhtlafat hayn: fl tykst: fl tykst ayk ksm ki andayks hay jo ays kyw ayl main mkml tykst srch kay liye astamal hawta haay۔ fl tykst andayks sirf anwda by ya maiy aai ays aay aym tyblza kay sath astamal kya jaskta haay۔ fl tykst andayks sirf char kay liye tshkyl diya jaskta haay۔، wrchar ، ya tykst kalm ۔fl tykst andayks tybl main ayk ya zayada krdar par mbny kalm shaml krsktay hayn۔ flt tykst andayks tkhlyk fl tykst andayks astytmnt ka astamal karty hoey bnaiay jasktay hayn۔ fl tykst andayks kdrty zaban ki mkml tykst tlash kay liye astamal hawtay hain aur tlash ki trjmany krsktay hayn۔kdrty zaban main ayk jmlha kay tawr par tar: jn ayk ksm ki andayks hay jo pwstghrys kyw ayl main mkml tykst tlash kay liye astamal hawta haay۔kha kalm main akdar mnfrd hayn۔ jyn andayks sirf TSVector akdar kay alfaza (lyksymza) ko astwr karty hain ، aur un kay wzan kay lybl nhayn۔phala mych tlash krskta hay ، phir un ktaarwn ko hatanay kay liye andayks ka astamal karain jn main azuafy alfaza ki kami haay۔ khlasaha main ، fl tykst aur jn do mkhtlf ksm kay asharyha hain jo baltrtyb ays kyw ayl aur pwst ghrys kyw ayl main mkml tykst tlash kay liye astamal hawtay hayn۔an dono kay darmiyan bnyady frk yeh hay keh fl tykst ko ays kyw ayl main kdrty zaban ki mkml tykst tlash kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، jabky jn ko pwstghrys kyw ayl main mlty wrda ki tlash kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔mzayd braan ، fl tykst andayks ko sirf anwda by ya maiy aai ays aay aym tyblza kay sath astamal kya jaskta hay ، jabky jn andayks pwstghrys kyw ayl main trjyhay tykst srch andayks ksm hayn۔aakhr main ، fl tykst andayks main tybl main ayk ya zayada krdar par mbny kalm shaml hawsktay hain ، jabky jn andayks sirf TSVector akdar kay alfaza (lyksymza) astwr karty hain ، aur un kay wzan kay lybl nhayn۔

Question: aalmy aur mkamy aarzuy tybl main kya frk haay؟
Answer: aalmy aur mkamy aarzuy jdwl kay mabyn aham akhtlafat yeh hayn: aalmy aarzuy jdwl: ayk aalmy aarzuy jdwl ki wzuahat ## ka ayk sabkha dy kar ki hogi hay aur srwr msaal kay tawr par is ka nshan lghaya gaya haay۔ ghlwbl aarzuy myzayn mnslk tamam syshnwn kay zaryaha dekhi jaskty hayn۔srwr pr۔ ghlwbl aarzuy jdwlwn ko ays kyw ayl srwr sy hata diya jata hay agar darap tybl kay zaryaha wazuha tawr par ghra diya jata haay۔ ghlwbl aarzuy jdwlwn ko khud bkhwd bhi khtm krdya jata hay js sy is kay mnktaa hawjata hay aur aalmy aarzuy tybl ko ab dusray knkshn kay zaryaha hawalha nahin diya jata haay۔ ghlwbl aarzuy jdwlyn hayn۔mfyd jab aap ko syshnwn kay mabyn dayta shyir karnay ki zurwrt hawty haay۔jb saarf ka knkshn band hawjata hay tou khud bkhwd mymwry sy hata diya jata haay۔ mkamy aarzuy jdwlyn dusray syshnwn par nzar nahin aaty hayn۔ lwkl aarzuy jdwlyn mfyd hain jab aap ko kesi mkhsawsa syshn kay liye aarzuy tawr par dayta astwr karnay ki zurwrt hawty haay۔ khlasaha main ، ayk aalmy aur ayk mkamy aarzuy jdwl haay۔ays kyw ayl srwr main do mkhtlf ksm kay aarzuy jdwlwn ko jo mkhtlf mkasad kay liye astamal hawtay hayn۔an dono kay darmiyan bnyady frk yeh hay keh ayk aalmy aarzuy jdwl srwr msaal kay tawr par askwp kya jata hay aur srwr sy mnslk tamam syshnwn kay zaryaha dekha jaskta hay ، jabky ayk mkamy aarzuy tybl ko is syshn main askwp kya jata hay js main aap nay isy tkhlyk kya hay aur is kay liye nzar nahin aata haay۔dwsray syshnza۔mzayd braan ، aalmy staha par aarzuy jdwlwn ko ays kyw ayl srwr sy hata diya jata hay agar wazuha tawr par darap tybl kay zaryaha ghra diya jata hay ya is kay bad jo is sy mnktaa hawta hay aur aalmy aarzuy tybl ko ab dusray rabtawn kay zaryaha hawalha nahin diya jata hay ، jabky mkamy aarzuy jdwlwn ko darap astytmnt ka astamal krkay ghra diya jata hay ya woh hayn۔jb saarf ka knkshn band hawjata hay tou khud bkhwd mymwry sy hata diya jata haay۔aakhr main ، aalmy aarzuy jdwlyn mfyd hain jab aap ko syshnwn kay mabyn dayta shyir karnay ki zurwrt hawty hay ، jab keh mkamy aarzuy jdwlyn mfyd hain jab aap ko ayk mkhsawsa syshn kay liye aarzuy tawr par dayta astwr karnay ki zurwrt hawty haay۔

Question: ayk chhwta sa tybl aur darap tybl kay byan main kya frk haay؟

kay liye pori tybl ko lak krdya۔ darap tybl ayk lagh un aapryshn hay ، is ka mtalb yeh hay keh isy waps rwl kya jaskta haay۔ darwp tybl tybl ki taryf ، rkawtwn aur asharyha ko hata dyta haay۔ khlasaha Question: bwlyn aur tnyynt dayta ki ksm main kya frk haay؟
Answer: yahan ayk bwlyn aur ayk tnyynt dayta ki ksm kay darmiyan aham akhtlafat hayn: bwlyn: bwlyn tnyint (1) ka mtradf hay js main ays kyw ayl myn۔ bwlyn ki akdar ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، jahan 0 ghalat ki nmaindghy krta hay aur 1 ki nmaindghy krta haay۔ bwwlyn ayk wahad haay-bait dayta ki ksm۔ bwwlyn mayary ays kyw ayl nahin hay ، lekin is ki taiyd bohat sy dayta bys sstmza kay zaryaha ki jati haay۔ tyny ant: tainynt ayk dayta taip hay jo ays kyw ayl main addy zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔as par dstkhta ya dstkhta shuda hayn۔ tyny ant ayk snghl bait dayta ki ksm haay۔ tyny ant ko chhwtay antyjrza ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ khlasaha main ، bwlyn aur tainynt ays kyw ayl main do mkhtlf dayta aksam hain jo mkhtlf mkasad kay liye astamal hawtay hayn۔an dono kay darmiyan bnyady frk yeh hay keh bwlyn tainnt (1) ka mtradf hay aur isy bwlyn akdar ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، jabky tynyynt chhwtay antyjrza ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔mzayd braan ، bwlyn ayk snghl bait dayta ki ksm hay ، jabky tnyint -128 sy 127 ya 0 sy 255 tak akdar ko zakhyrha krskta hay ، is par mnhasar hay keh aya is par dstkhta kyay gaye hain ya dstkhta shuda hayn۔aakhr main ، bwlyn mayary ays kyw ayl nahin hay ، lekin is ki taiyd bohat sy dayta bys sstm kay zaryaha ki jati hay ، jabky tyny ant ayk mayary ays kyw ayl dayta ki ksm haay۔

Question: INT aur BIGINT dayta ki ksm main kya frk haay؟

Question: aynwm aur syt dayta ki ksm main kya frk haay؟

Question: ayk mntkhb * aur mntkhb kalm_ nam kay byan main kya frk haay؟

Question: kesi aardar kay zaryaha aur had kay byan main kya frk haay؟
Answer: ayk aardar kay zaryaha aur ayk had kay byan kay mabyn aham akhtlafat yeh hayn: aardar bzaryaha: byan kay zaryaha aardar ka astamal ayk ya zayada kalmwn ki bnyad par chrahnay ya nzawl aardar ki bnyad par hony waly ntaij ko trtyb denay kay liye kya jaskta haay۔ byan kay zaryaha ayk trtyb ASC ya DESC ki wrda kay sath astamal kya jaskta hay takha trtyb kay aardar ki wzuahat ki jaskay۔ lymt: Answer: tyblza ko dkhaiyn aur tybl ki wzuahat tybl kay baray main malwmat zaahar karnay kay liye ays kyw ayl main astamal hony waly do ays kyw ayl byanat hayn۔an kay mabyn akhtlafat yeh hayn: tyblza dkhaiyn: shw tyblza ayk byan hay jo ays kyw ayl dayta bys 12345 main tamam jdwlwn ki fharst zaahar karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ shw tyblza ko btawr pytrn 2 ko fltr karnay kay liye tyblza ki fharst ko fltr karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔maiy ays kyw ayl 125 kay liye ays kyw ayl wrk bynch aur day byfwrj astwdayw jesay twlza kay sath astamal kya jaskta haay۔ tybl ki wzuahat karain tybl ayk aysa byan hay jo ayk tybl ki sakht ko ays kyw ayl dayta bys 12635 main zaahar karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔tybl 12635. dayskraib tybl ko tybl kay baray main azuafy malwmat zaahar karnay kay liye mkml mtalwbha alfaza kay sath astamal kya jaskta hay ، jesay pehlay sy taay shuda akdar aur kryktr syt 63۔ dayskraib tybl ko ays kyw ayl wrk bynch aur day by fwrj astwdayw jesay twlza kay sath astamal kya jaskta haay۔ays kyw ayl dayta bys main tamam jdwlwn ki fharst ko zaahar karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، jabky tybl ko ays kyw ayl dayta bys 126345 main tybl ki sakht ko zaahar karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔shw tyblza ko kesi nmwnha ki bnyad par tyblza ki fharst ko fltr karnay kay liye laiyk shk kay sath astamal kya jaskta hay ، jabky tybl ki wzuahat karty hoey kalm kay nam ، dayta ki aksam aur kesi tybl ki rkawtwn ko dkhata haay۔shw tyblza ko ays kyw ayl kay liye ays kyw ayl wrk bynch aur day byfwrj astwdayw jesay twlza kay sath astamal kya jaskta hay ، jabky tybl ki wzuahat tybl ko tybl kay baray main azuafy malwmat zaahar karnay kay liye mkml mtalwbha alfaza kay sath astamal kya jaskta haay۔
