Answer: dayta bys kay baray main malwmat zaahar karnay kay liye dayta bys aur astamal dayta bys dkhaiyn do ays kyw ayl byanat hayn۔an kay mabyn akhtlafat yeh hayn: dayta bys dkhaiyn: dayta bys ayk byan hay jo ayk ays kyw ayl srwr 12345 main tamam dayta bys ki fharst zaahar karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ dkhaiyn dayta bys ko ayk pytrn 3 par mbny dayta bys ki fharst ko fltr karnay kay liye laik shk kay sath astamal kya jaskta haay۔ays kyw ayl 125 kay liye ays kyw ayl wrk bynch aur day byfwrj astwdayw jesay twlza kay sath astamal kya jaskta haay۔dayta bys ko ays kyw ayl wrk bynch aur day by fwrj astwdayw jesay twlza kay sath astamal kya jaskta haay۔ ays kyw ayl 15. un smry kay liye ، dayta bys ko ays kyw ayl srwr main mwjwd tamam dayta bys ki fharst zaahar karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، jabky astamal dayta bys ko ays kyw ayl srwr 123456 main dayta bys ka antkhab karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔dkhaiyn dayta bys ko kesi nmwnha ki bnyad par dayta bys ki fharst ko fltr karnay kay liye laik shk kay sath astamal kya jaskta hay ، jabky astamal dayta bys ko yeh btanay kay liye astamal kya jata hay keh is kay bad kay ays kyw ayl kay byanat kay liye kon sa dayta bys astamal kya jana chahaiay۔dkhaiyn dayta bys ko ays kyw ayl kay liye ays kyw ayl wrk bynch aur day byfwrj astwdayw jesay twlza kay sath astamal kya jaskta hay ، jabky astamal dayta bys ko maiy ays kyw ayl wrk bynch aur day byfwrj astwdayw jesay twlza kay sath astamal kya jaskta haay۔

Question: shw ghrant aur shw mtghyr kay byan main kya frk haay؟
Answer: ghrant dkhaiyn aur dkhaiyn mtghyrat baltrtyb saarf kay mraaat aur sstm mtghyr kay baray main malwmat zaahar karnay kay liye ays kyw ayl main astamal hony waly do ays kyw ayl byanat hayn۔an kay mabyn akhtlafat yeh hayn: ghrant dkhaiyn: dkhaiyn ghrant ayk aysa byan hay jo maiy ays kyw ayl saarf akaؤnt ya rwl 12345 ko tfwyzu krdha mraaat aur krdar ko zaahar karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ ghrant ghrant kay byanat ki shkl main mraaat ko zaahar krta hay js ko asthakak ki nkl tyar karnay kay liye aml main laya jana chahaiay۔asainmnts 12345. shw ghrant mraaat zaahar nahin krta hay jo namzad akaؤnt main dstyab hain lekin ayk mkhtlf akaؤnt ko dyiay jatay hayn۔sstm mtghyr ko ays kyw ayl srwr 6 main dasplay kryn۔ shw mtghyr hr sstm ka nam aur kdr zaahar krta haay۔ays kyw ayl wrk bynch aur day by fwrj astwdayw kay liye ays kyw ayl 6۔mry kay liye ، shw ghrants ko ays kyw ayl saarf akaؤnt ya krdar ko tfwyzu krdha mraaat aur krdar ko zaahar karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، jabky shw mtghyr ko ays kyw ayl srwr 123456 main sstm kay mtghyrat ko zaahar karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ghrant kay byanat ki shkl main ghrant dkhata hay js ko asthakak kay asainmnts ko nkl karnay kay liye aml main laya jana chahaiay ، jabky mtghyr hr sstm mtghyr ka nam aur kdr dkhata haay۔shw ghrant mraaat zaahar nahin krta hay jo namzad akaؤnt main dstyab hain lekin isy ayk mkhtlf akaؤnt main dyiay jatay hain ، jabky nmwnha ki bnyad par mtghyrat ki fharst ko fltr karnay kay liye is tarah ki shk kay sath mtghyrat ko astamal kya jaskta haay۔dwnwn hi ghrant aur shw mtghyrat ko maiy ays kyw ayl wrk bynch aur day byfwrj astwdayw jesay twlza kay sath astamal kya jaskta haay۔

Question: ayk wzuahat aur tjzayha tybl kay byan main kya frk haay؟
Answer: wzuahat aur tjzayha tybl kay byanat baltrtyb astfsar par aml draamd kay mnsawbwn aur tybl kay aadadwshmar kay baray main malwmat zaahar karnay kay liye ays kyw ayl main astamal hony waly do ays kyw ayl byanat hayn۔an kay mabyn akhtlafat yeh hayn: wzuahat: wzuahat ayk byan hay jo kesi mntkhb krdha ، hazaf ، dakhl karnay ، tbdyl karnay ، ya ap dayt kay byan kay baray main malwmat ko ays kyw ayl dayta bys 123 main byan karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔astamal shuda ksm ki ksm ، astamal shuda asharyha jat ، aur ktaarwn ki tkhmynha shuda tadad js ki janch ki jaye ghy۔: tjzayha tybl ayk aysa byan hay jo ayk ays kyw ayl dayta bys 45 main kesi tybl kay aadadwshmar ka tjzayha karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ tjzayha tybl nay sab sy mwsar amldraamd plan 45 ka antkhab karnay kay liye astfsar aaptaizar kay zaryaha astamal hony waly aadadwshmar ko ap dayt kya۔astfsar aaptaizar kay tkhmynay 45. tjzayha tybl ko ays kyw ayl 45 kay liye ays kyw ayl wrk bynch aur day byfwrj astwdayw jesay twlza kay sath astamal kya jaskta haay۔ khlasaha main ، wzuahat ko mntkhb ، hazaf ، dakhl ، dakhl karnay ، tbdyl karnay ya ap dayt karnay kay byan kay baray main malwmat zaahar karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ays kyw ayl dayta bys ، jabky tjzayha tybl ko ays kyw ayl dayta bys 12435 main kesi tybl kay aadadwshmar ka tjzayha karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔as trtyb ki wzuahat karain keh js trtyb main tyblza tak rsaiy haasal ki jati hay ، astamal shuda jwain ki ksm ، astamal shuda asharyha ، aur ktaarwn ki tkhmynha shuda tadad js ki janch ki jaye gi ، jabky tjzayha karain tybl ko astfsar karnay waly kay zaryaha astamal hony waly aadadwshmar ko ap dayt kya jata hay takha amldraamd kay anthaaiy mwsar mnsawbay ka antkhab kya jaskay۔wzuahat ko karkrdghy ki rkawtwn ki nshandhay krkay swalat ko bhatr bnanay kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay ، jabky tjzayha tybl ko astfsar karnay waly tkhmynay ki drstghy ko bhatr bna kar swalat ko bhatr bnanay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔dwnwn wzuahat aur tjzayha tybl ko maiy ays kyw ayl wrk wrk bynch aur day by fwrj astwdayw jesay twlza kay sath astamal kya jaskta haay۔

Question: ayk chhwta sa tybl aur darap tybl kay byan main kya frk haay؟
Answer: trnkyt tybl aur darap tybl do ays kyw ayl byanat hain jo ays kyw ayl dayta bys sy tyblza ya dayta ko hatanay kay liye astamal hawtay hayn۔an kay mabyn akhtlafat yeh hayn: trnkyt tybl: trnkyt tybl ayk aysa byan hay jo kesi tybl sy tamam rykardaza ko ays kyw ayl dayta bys 12345 main hatanay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ trnkyt tybl hazaf karnay sy tyza tr hay kywnkha yeh ktaar ko hazaf karnay par lagh un nahin hawta hay aur mtadd rkawtwn ko nzarandaza nahin krta haay۔tybl 12345 par tybl tybl ko dwbarha trtyb dyn tybl 12345 par aatw_ ankrmnt kaؤntrza ko dwbarha trtyb dyn۔ tybl tybl ayk day day ayl (dayta dayfynyshn lynghwyj) kmanda hay ، lhazaa is ko byk 12345. darap tybl: darap tybl ayk tybl ko hatanay kay liye astamal kya jata hay aur is kay tamam aadad wa shmar ko khtm karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ays kyw ayl dayta bys 123645. darap tybl is kay dayta 123645 kay alawha tybl ki taryf ko hata dyta haay۔ darwp tybl ayk day day ayl kmanda hay ، lhazaa is ko waps nahin kya jaskta haay۔ays kyw ayl dayta bys main ayk tybl sy ، jabky darap tybl ko ayk tybl aur is kay tamam dayta ko ays kyw ayl dayta bys 123645 sy hatanay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔trnkyt tybl hazaf karnay sy tyza tr hay kywnkha yeh ktaar ko hazaf karnay par lagh un nahin hawta hay aur tybl par nafza ki janay wali mtadd rkawtwn ko nzarandaza krta hay ، jabky darap tybl apnay aadad wa shmar kay alawha tybl ki taryf ko bhi hatata haay۔trashay hoey tybl tybl par aatw_ ankrymnt kaؤntrza ko dwbarha trtyb dytay hain ، jabky darap tybl main darap asthakak ki zurwrt hawty haay۔dwnwn trashay hoey tybl aur darap tybl day day ayl kmandaza hain ، lhazaa un ko waps nahin kya jaskta۔

Question: ayk mntkhb * aur mntkhb kalm_ nam kay byan main kya frk haay؟
Answer: mntkhb karain * aur mntkhb karain kalm_ nam do ays kyw ayl kay byanat hain jo tyblza sy dayta bazayaft karnay kay liye ays kyw ayl main astamal hawtay hayn۔an kay mabyn akhtlafat yeh hayn: mntkhb karain *: mntkhb karain * ayk aysa byan hay jo kesi tybl sy tamam kalmwn ko ays kyw ayl dayta bys 12 main bazayaft karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ slykt * ko kesi tybl sy tamam kalmwn ko liye sirf un kalmwn ko bazayaft karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay ، jo mntkhb karnay sy kahain zayada mwsar hawsktay hain * kywnkha yeh sirf zurwry dayta 13425 ko dwbarha haasal krta haay۔ kalm_ nam ko astamal kya jaskta haay۔ksy tybl sy mkhsawsa kalmwn ko bazayaft karain jab mkhsawsa kalmwn ko bazayaft karnay kay liye jana jata hay 13425. mntkhb kalm_ nam ko mtadd jdwlwn sy mkhsawsa kalmwn ki bazayaft kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay jab kalmwn ko bazayaft karnay kay liye ayk hi nam 345.in ka khlasaha hawta hay ، mntkhb karain * tamam kalmwn ko bazayaft karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ays kyw ayl dayta bys main ayk tybl sy ، jabky mntkhb kalm_ nam ko ays kyw ayl dayta bys 13425 main tybl sy mkhsawsa kalmwn ko bazayaft karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔mntkhb karain * ko kesi tybl sy tamam kalmwn ko bazayaft karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay is sy ktaa nzar keh un kay namwn ya dayta ki aksam sy ktaa nzar ، jabky mntkhb kalm_ nam sirf kalmwn ki bazayaft kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay jn ki zurwrt haay۔mntkhb karain * mntkhb kalm_ nam sy kam mwsar hawskta hay kywnkha yeh tamam kalmwn ko bazayaft krta hay ، bshmwl woh jn ki zurwrt nahin haay۔mntkhb kalm_ nam ko kesi tybl sy mkhsawsa kalmwn ko bazayaft karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay jab mkhsawsa kalmwn ko bazayaft karnay kay liye jana jata hay ، jabky mntkhb kalm_ nam ko mtadd jdwlwn sy mkhsawsa kalmwn ko bazayaft karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay jab kalmwn ko bazayaft kya jaiay۔

Question: jahan shk aur ayk shk ki shk kay darmiyan frk haay؟
Answer: jahan shk aur hony wali shk dayta ko fltr karnay kay liye ays kyw ayl main astamal hony waly do ays kyw ayl byanat hayn۔an kay mabyn akhtlafat yeh hayn: jahan shk: jahan shk ko braha rast tybl par dayta ko fltr karnay kay liye ayk mkhsawsa haalt 123456 ki bnyad par astamal kya jata haay۔ jahan shk ko ktaar aapryshn 123456 kay tawr par laghw kya jata haay۔ jahan shk sirf fltr dayta ko kndayshn 123456 par mbny khynchty haay۔jhaan shk mntkhb ، ap dayt ، aur hazaf karnay waly byanat kay sath kam krty hay ۔123456۔ yeh jahan shk mjmway afaal 123456 kay sath kam nahin krty haay۔ shk: hony wali shk ko tybl 123456 par tyar krdha ghrwpwn kay dayta ko fltr karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ is shk ko kalm kay tawr par laghw kya jata haay۔aapryshn 123456. is shk ka hona fltr ki haalt 123456 ka atalak karnay sy pehlay tamam aadad wa shmar ko laya jata haay۔ shk sirf mntkhb krdha byanat 123456 kay sath kam krty haay۔ shk ka astamal mjmway afaal par hawta hay js par ghrwp nay 123456. khlasaha kya hay ، jahan shk ko braha rast dayta ko fltr karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay jahan braha rast dayta ko fltr karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay jahan braha rast dayta fltr karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔tybl ayk mkhsawsa haalt par mbny hay ، jabky rkhnay wali shk ko tybl 123456 par tyar krdha ghrwpwn kay dayta ko fltr karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔jhaan shk ko ayk ktaar kay aapryshn kay tawr par laghw kya jata hay ، jabky rkhnay ki shk ko kalm aapryshn kay tawr par laghw kya jata haay۔jhaan ki shk sirf haalt ki bnyad par fltr dayta ko khynchty hay ، jabky shk ka hona fltr ki haalt ko laghw karnay sy pehlay tamam dayta ko lata haay۔jhaan shk mntkhb ، ap dayt ، aur hazaf karnay waly byanat kay sath kam krty hay ، jabky shk sirf mntkhb byanat kay sath kam krty haay۔jhaan shk mjmway afaal kay sath kam nahin krty hay ، jabky hony wali shk mjmway afaal par astamal hawty hay js par ghrwp nay anjam diya haay۔

Question: kesi ghrwp kay zaryaha aur ayk alag byan main kya frk haay؟
Answer: ghrwp kay zaryaha aur alag alag byanat ays kyw ayl main dayta ko fltr karnay kay liye astamal hawtay hayn۔an kay mabyn akhtlafat yeh hayn: algh: alag alag byan ka astamal ays kyw ayl dayta bys 123 main kalm sy mnfrd akdar ko bazayaft karnay kay liye kya jata haay۔ dastnt ko ntaij syt 123 sy daplykyt ko door karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ksy ayk kalm 123 sy mnfrd akdar ko bazayaft kryn۔afaal jesay ghnty () ، zayada sy zayada () ، kam sy kam () ، rkm () ، aur aay wy jy () 13. ghrwp bazaria mtadd kalm 13.in smry sy mnfrd akdar ko bazayaft karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔ays kyw ayl dayta bys main kalm ، jabky ghrwp baiy ayk ya zayada kalm 123 par mbny ghrwpwn ki ktaar main astamal hawta haay۔ntaij kay syt sy nkl ko door karnay kay liye alag alag astamal kya jata hay ، jabky ghrwp kay zaryaha ghrwp bndy ki bnyad par dayta ko jma karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ksy ayk kalm sy mnfrd akdar ko bazayaft karnay kay liye mntkhb byanat kay sath alag alag astamal kya jaskta hay ، jabky ghrwp bazaria mjmway afaal jesay ghnty () ، zayada sy zayada () ، mnt () ، rkm () ، aur aay wy jy () mnfrd bazayaft kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔mtadd kalmwn sy akdar

Question: andrwny shmwlyt aur baien bazaw main shaml hony main kya frk haay؟
Answer: andrwny shmwlyt aur baien shmwlyt do ksm kay shaml hain jo ayk sy zayada jdwlwn sy dayta aktha karnay kay liye ays kyw ayl main astamal hawtay hayn۔an kay mabyn akhtlafat yeh hayn: andrwny shmwlyt: andrwny shmwlyt ayk mkhsawsa haalt 1234 ki bnyad par dono jdwlwn sy sirf mmasal ktaaryn waps karnay kay liye astamal ki jati haay۔shk 1234 par ya is ka astamal karty hawiay۔ anrl jwain ko do sy zayada tyblza 1234 main shaml karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔ mkml shmwlyt: baien shmary ko baien myza sy tamam ktaaryn waps karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay aur ayk mkhsawsa haalt 1234 ki bnyad par dien tybl sy mlap ki ktaaryn۔baiyn tybl sy tamam ktaaryn aur dien tybl sy mmasal ktaaryn۔aghr sahayha jdwl main koi mych nahin hay tou ، kaladm akdar 1234 ko waps krdyiay jatay hayn۔ mkml jwain ko aan ya shk 1234 kay sath astamal kya jaskta haay۔ayk mkhsawsa haalt ki bnyad par dono jdwlwn sy ktaarwn sy mlnay wali ktaaryn ، jabky baien jwain ka astamal baien tybl sy tamam ktaaryn aur ayk mkhsawsa haalt 1234 ki bnyad par dien tybl sy mmasal ktaaryn waps karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔andrwny shmwlyt sirf un ktaarwn ki wapsy krty hay jn ki dono jdwlwn main mmasal akdar hain ، jabky baien bazaw baien myza sy tamam ktaaryn aur dien tybl sy mmasal ktaaryn lwtata haay۔aghr sahayha jdwl main koi mych nahin hay tou ، kaladm akdar waps krdy jati hayn۔dwnwn andrwny jwain aur lyft jwain ko aan ya shk kay sath astamal kya jaskta hay aur do sy zayada jdwlwn main shaml hony kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔

Answer: andrwny shmwlyt aur baien shmwlyt do ksm kay shaml hain jo ayk sy zayada jdwlwn sy dayta aktha karnay kay liye ays kyw ayl main astamal hawtay hayn۔aaؤtr jwain ayk aam asatalaha hay js main baien jwain aur dien shmwlyt dono shaml hayn۔yhaan andrwny shmwlyt aur baien shmwlyt kay mabyn akhtlafat hayn: andrwny shmwlyt: dono jdwlwn sy sirf ayk mkhsawsa haalt 1234 ki bnyad par dono jdwlwn sy mlnay wali ktaaryn waps karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔shk 1234 kay sath astamal karain ya astamal kryn۔.ayft main shaml hony sy baien tybl sy tamam ktaaryn aur dien tybl sy mmasal ktaaryn lwt jati hayn۔aghr sahayha jdwl main koi mych nahin hay tou ، NULL akdar ko 123456 waps krdya jata haay۔ mkml jwain ko shk 123456 kay sath astamal kya jaskta haay۔ayk mkhsawsa haalt ki bnyad par dono jdwlwn sy ktaarwn sy mlnay wali ktaaryn ، jabky baien jwain ka astamal baien tybl sy tamam ktaaryn aur ayk mkhsawsa haalt 123456 ki bnyad par dien tybl sy mmasal ktaaryn waps karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔andrwny shmwlyt sirf un ktaarwn ki wapsy krty hay jn ki dono jdwlwn main mmasal akdar hain ، jabky baien bazaw baien myza sy tamam ktaaryn aur dien tybl sy mmasal ktaaryn lwtata haay۔aghr sahayha jdwl main koi mych nahin hay tou ، kaladm akdar waps krdy jati hayn۔andrwny jwain ko aan ya shk kay sath astamal kya jaskta hay aur isy do sy zayada jdwlwn main shaml hony kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay ، jabky baien jwain ko aan ya shk kay sath astamal kya jaskta hay aur do sy zayada tyblza main shaml hony kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔

Question: ywnyn aur ywnyn kay tamam byan main kya frk haay؟
